# Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap Sweet Summer Aloe and Avocado 3+1

*Price: $12.45*

## Refreshing Scent with Soothing Benefits

Indulge in the light, refreshing scent of aloe with a hint of sweet cucumber with Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap Sweet Summer Aloe and Avocado. This gentle soap is perfect for soothing and healing dry skin, thanks to its natural aloe vera extracts. Say goodbye to skin irritations and hello to a nourished, healthy glow.

## Trusted and Loved

With an average rating of 4.1 stars from 19 happy customers, Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap is widely adored for its effectiveness and delightful fragrance. According to one review, this soap works wonders in clearing up acute eczema, leaving the skin feeling fresh and rejuvenated. Another satisfied customer mentions how this soap not only moisturizes the skin but also smells absolutely wonderful.

## Convenient and Versatile

The Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap Sweet Summer Aloe and Avocado is not just about its delightful scent and soothing benefits. It is also extremely convenient to use, with each pack containing 3 bars plus an additional bonus bar. The soap is lightweight, making it ideal for travel or for effortlessly fitting into your daily routine.

## Gentle on the Skin, Kind to the Environment

Rest easy knowing that Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap is not tested on animals, ensuring its ethical production process. The product is crafted with creamy avocado and olive oil extracts, leaving your skin feeling moisturized and nourished without any greasy residue.

*Please note that the actual product may be different than the product image shown.*

## Take the First Step towards Healthy, Nourished Skin

With Yardley of London Moisturizing Soap Sweet Summer Aloe and Avocado, you can experience the soothing benefits of aloe vera combined with the nourishing power of avocado. Don't miss out on this opportunity to achieve healthy, glowing skin. Place your order today and enjoy the benefits of this refreshing soap!

Product ID: B0011DN60Q Title: Magick Botanicals Conditioner for Thinning Hair Fragrance Free - 16 fl oz Average Rating: 3.8 Number of Ratings: 16 Features: ['Name Conditioner Thin Hair Fragrance Free', 'Quantity 16 OZ'] Description: ['Formula for healthy hair and scalp, safe for the chemically sensitive and colored or treated hair.'] Price: 22.89 Store: Magick Botanicals Details: {"Product Dimensions": "2.5 x 2.5 x 8.5 inches; 13.6 Ounces", "Item model number": "000469008012", "UPC": "000469008012 000469008005", "Manufacturer": "Magick Botanicals"} Review Text: Always love their products. Little pricey though. No allergens to bother my scalp. Made my hair soft and full. I highly recommend this conditioner for anyone with sensitive skin or skin allergies. This company ran by women has made a wonderfully thick and effective non toxic series - this conditioner Ive been using for 10 years since developing an issue with many products after being poisoned. I simply love this product, my go to hair product. Many comment on my full head of long grey hair, thick at 62, My wife bought this more for the ingredients than the hair loss factor.
She is struggling with hair loss, has not used this product long enough to be able to judge long term change.
She has bad allergies to.. Well everything!
Being a fragrance free allergen free product this has performed well. With no reactions. It adds quite a bit of volume and fullness. Her hair has not looked so full and thick in several years.
This is now her primary goto product at a cost much lower than product we have previously tried. This is a great everyday conditioner for anyone with fine hair. If you need fragrance-free hair products, this is a great brand to buy. I have used the regular shampoo for years, but my store is always out of it. I looked online and saw there was a conditioner for thinning hair. I liked this because it seemed thick and it did condition my hair better than other products. I am pleased with it. There aren’t many fragrance free conditioners available so it is great to find one that is so good. This conditioner is good in the fact that it doesn't have fragrances, parabens, etc. and is gentle for chemically sensitive, but it is very thin and watery for a conditioner. Desert Organics Fragrance Free is much thicker and better, but more expensive per oz. I guess I will be buying the more expensive one from now on.

Product ID: B001MP47WE
Title: Supernail China Silk Wrap, 72 Inch
Average Rating: 4.2
Number of Ratings: 786
Features: ['Provides added strength and protection', 'Made of 100% pure silk', 'Comes in 72 inch roll']
Description: ['Supernail china silk wrap is made from 100% pure silk that provides added strength and protection.']
Price: 6.47
Store: SuperNail
Details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "2 x 4 x 5 inches; 0.63 Ounces", "Item model number": "51010", "UPC": "073930510109", "Manufacturer": "Supernail"}
Review Text: Worked fine. This is my first time using plain silk wrap and I love it!  I started using the self adhesive silk tabs to fix cracks and they worked great so I wrapped all my nails but I had to keep buying them. So I upgraded to this. I'm so glad I did. Yes it takes longer to do my nails now but it's so totally worth it. I wrap my nails every week or so and there's still so much of it left! I will not buy anything else, EVER! This product is great for mending broken and cracked nails, but it is a little difficult to cut the silk to the right size. Too thick for me. This silk wrap has been very hard for me to find so I was super excited when I saw it on amazon. It seems everyone has the pre-cut "stickers" but it's hard to find the silk strips like these. Product arrived nicely packaged and there is a lot of silk in there but on one of the strips it has been cut and sewed together on a diagonal which means you cannot use that whole area (about 3 inches long), at least not the way I apply my silk. This was disappointing, but the rest of the silk is usable. Used as directed, fell of in 24 hours.  I was hoping to find something to strengthen my nails, as I use them a lot for arts and crafts.  Fake nails damage my nails, so I was hoping this would be an alternative, but now I'll just be using it for...arts and crafts. Does what it says! My daughter uses this to repair broken nails. She loves it Works well. My daughter loves her nails and keeping them long. She also loves basketball and being active. See where this is going? She broke a nail and we used this plus gel polish to repair the nail until the length had grown out. It is strong, thin, easy to use, and sheer enough that it looked natural.

## Enhance Your Nail's Resilience and Protect Your Natural Beauty

### Versatile and Long-Lasting

# Stage Blood 4 oz: The Perfect Choice for Realistic Effects

## Overview
Create stunning and realistic effects with Ben Nye's Stage Blood 4 oz. This highly-rated stage blood product is graphically real and suitable for all genres. With its authentic arterial coloring and medium viscosity, it delivers the perfect visual impact. 

## Features
- Authentic arterial coloring for a realistic effect
- Medium viscosity for easy application and control
- Corn syrup-based with a peppermint flavor
- Safe for use in the mouth
- Washes off most fabrics and surfaces (please test before use)
- Provides 12-30 applications

## Benefits
Enhance your Halloween costumes or theatrical productions with this exceptional stage blood. Capture the attention of your audience with its vivid coloring and lasting effects. Its medium viscosity ensures easy application, allowing you to create the desired look effortlessly. Plus, its unique corn syrup base and peppermint flavor are safe to use in and around the mouth, providing an authentic experience for actors and performers. 

## Customer Reviews
Here's what our customers have to say about Ben Nye's Stage Blood 4 oz:

- "This product is amazing!!!!! I have always used Ben NYE products for Halloween, and this brand continues to exceed my expectations. Highly recommended."
- "This stage blood works so amazingly with skin and latex, so no matter the look you're going for, it'll work great!!! Highly recommended for special FX makeup or even to prank someone."
- "I've tried many types of stage blood but was never as satisfied as I was with Ben Nye. Honestly, it's the best out there: rich, realistic color and pooling; and it sticks to skin, liquid latex, and any makeup. Dries quickly but still gives flexibility for dripping or other movement."

## Trust Ben Nye for Exceptional Quality

With its incredible reviews and long-lasting effects, Ben Nye's Stage Blood 4 oz is the perfect choice for all your creative endeavors. Trust in our brand to deliver the best results, whether you're creating Halloween looks, producing thrilling performances, or engaging in special FX makeup. Buy now and take your artistic expression to the next level!

**Price:** $31.73  
**Store:** Ben Nye

# MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap

## Description

Transform your daily shower routine into a rejuvenating ocean escape with the MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap. Dive into a world of juicy citrus and fresh florals as they swim through this refreshing aqua bar. Crafted with over 25% vegetable glycerin, our soap moisturizes your skin with a rich lather that rinses cleanly away, leaving your skin silky smooth. 

### Highly Moisturizing

Glycerin is a powerful humectant that attracts and locks in moisture, keeping your skin hydrated throughout the day. With our soap's high concentration of glycerin, it deeply nourishes your skin, leaving it beautifully moisturized and rejuvenated.

### Great for Face & Body

Experience the gentle cleansing power of our glycerin soap on your face and body. Unlike regular soaps that can dry out your skin, our glycerin soap removes excess oil and unclogs pores without causing dryness. Feel the difference as your skin stays hydrated and refreshed after each use.

### High-Quality Ingredients

Crafted in small batches, our proprietary soap formula is vegan, sodium lauryl sulfate, and paraben-free. Made with care in California, USA, each bar embodies our commitment to quality and sustainability. 

### Perfect Gift

Each 5.8 oz. bar is individually shrink-wrapped, making it an ideal gift for loved ones. Treat yourself or surprise someone special with the indulgent luxury of our MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap.

## Specifications

- Brand: Primal Elements
- Scent: Aqua Fresh, Citrus
- Skin Type: Dry
- Material Feature: Cruelty-Free, Vegan
- Item Form: Bar
- Package Dimensions: 4.53 x 2.72 x 0.75 inches
- Item model number: SWMER
- UPC: 640986102710

## Customer Reviews

With an average rating of 4.5 stars, our customers can't get enough of the MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap. Here's what they have to say:

- "COOL! Smells so good, love it!"
- "Love it--just as pictured--nice scent!"
- "Gonna get one for my sis who thinks she was a mermaid in a prior life!!!"
- "Gave this to my sister who loves Florida and the beaches down there. She laughed and enjoyed."

Don't miss out on the revitalizing benefits of our MERMAID Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap. Treat your skin to the ultimate nourishment and make each shower a blissful moment. Order now and experience the magic yourself.

The lightweight formula of Garnier Fructis Color Sealer is proven to stop dry-out and fight fade-out. Infused with acai berry and grape seed oil, it instantly seals in color, ensuring longer-lasting vibrancy. Say goodbye to dull-looking hair! 

But that's not all. This leave-in conditioner also improves manageability and delivers lasting softness. You'll love how easy it is to style your hair after using Garnier Fructis Color Sealer. 

## Protect Your Hair
Not only does Garnier Fructis Color Sealer enhance the appearance of your hair, but it also protects it. With its UVA and UVB protectant, this product helps shield your hair from harmful sun rays. You can enjoy the outdoors without worrying about your color-faded hair.

## Forever Living Products ALOE MSM GEL, 4 oz.

*Rating: 4.3 (based on 248 ratings)*

**Relieve discomfort with Aloe MSM Gel**

When you're in need of soothing relief, turn to Forever Living Products ALOE MSM GEL. This powerful gel combines the benefits of Methyl Sulfonyl Methane (MSM) and pure, stabilized Aloe Vera to provide you with the comfort you deserve. 

### Key Features:

1. Clear, non-staining formula
2. Delivering soothing relief anytime
3. Contains pure, stabilized Aloe Vera

### Discover the Power of ALOE MSM GEL

MSM, an organic sulfur found in all living organisms, is the essential ingredient that makes this gel highly effective. Our body relies on sulfur for numerous functions, and with Aloe MSM Gel, you can now experience its benefits directly. Thanks to its clear, non-staining formula, Aloe MSM Gel is convenient to use, leaving no traces behind.

### Soothe and Restore

Enhanced with herbal extracts and carefully selected ingredients, Aloe MSM Gel not only provides soothing relief but also encourages natural recovery. The powerful combination of Methyl Sulfonyl Methane and Aloe Vera penetrates deep into the skin, delivering targeted comfort to areas where you need it most. 

### Easy to Use

Simply apply the gel liberally and massage it into the desired areas of your skin. In case of eye contact, flush the affected area with water for several minutes. For maximum comfort and convenience, repeat the application as needed—whenever you're seeking soothing relief.

Trust Forever Living Products ALOE MSM GEL to deliver the comfort you desire. Take advantage of the benefits of organic sulfur and pure Aloe Vera by trying Aloe MSM Gel today.

*Aloe MSM Gel is FDA approved and made by Forever Living Products, renowned for producing high-quality health and wellness products.*

**Store:** [Forever Living Products](https://www.foreverliving.com/)

## Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice (10 lbs.)

### Experience the Finest Basmati Rice

Introducing Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice, a true delicacy that will elevate your meals to new heights. This extraordinary Pusa Basmati (Raw) variety is carefully handpicked and aged for 1-2 years, resulting in 7.55mm long grains that are visibly longer and offer a touch of natural sweetness. With its enchanting aroma, this basmati rice is sure to cast a spell on your taste buds.

### Unleash the Best Flavors with Kohinoor

Cooking this exquisite basmati rice is effortless. In a rice cooker, simply combine two cups of rice with three cups of water, and watch as it transforms into fluffy perfection. Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice doesn't stick, ensuring every grain remains separate and inviting.

### Elevate Your Culinary Creations

Whether paired with a delectable curry or any sauce of your choice, Kohinoor Basmati Rice stands as the perfect companion. Its long grains provide a generous base for absorbing all the flavors, taking your meals from ordinary to extraordinary. Create memorable dining experiences with ease.

### Trusted Quality and Impeccable Taste

With an average rating of 4.1 stars from 29 customers, it's clear that Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice is a favorite among rice connoisseurs. Customers praise its long grain size, delightful aroma, and remarkable taste. Some even consider it the best Basmati Rice they've ever tried.

### Order now and savor the experience

Don't miss out on a culinary delight that will turn your meals into unforgettable feasts. Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice is brought to you by the reputable brand, Kohinoor. They're known for their commitment to quality and creating exceptional products.

So why wait? Enhance your cooking and elevate your dining experiences today with Kohinoor Silver Range Basmati Rice. Place your order now and embark on a culinary journey like no other.

document:
Product ID: B00KXJ0JJU Title: Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic Average Rating: 3.8 Number of Ratings: 11 Features: ['100% synthetic shaving brush', 'Soft Bristles for Close Shave', 'Fabulous Quality and Value!', 'Easy to Hold, Comfortable Resin Handle', 'Made in Italy'] Description: ['Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic. Made in Italy'] Price: 6.94 Store: OMEGA Details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "1 x 3 x 2 inches; 0.96 Ounces", "Item model number": "90018Green", "Manufacturer": "OMEGA"} Review Text: good product. I decided to try this because I don't want to use animal hair. It's a good brush but my only complaint is the handle! It's not solid and it pops open very easily. Water gets inside it every time I shave and I have to open it so it dries out. It's just not well designed. I will probably glue it and seal it to avoid this problem.
Putting that aside, the brush itself works well. It's easy to clean, dries quickly, and builds a nice lather. I would probably pick something with a solid handle instead of this. Good quality and works well. Excellent bang for your buck. Bristles are actually pretty soft contrary to what some naysayers are reporting. I was able to whip up a nice, foamy lather with this brush. I have sensitive, acne-prone skin and I was able to comfortably use this brush on my face for all three passes. I'd argue that the softness of this brush is on par with entry-level silver tip badger brushes, and it isn't as stiff. The biggest pro is that this brush has no animal smell and doesn't require you to soak it in water. Personally, I prefer a nice soft brush instead of a stiff or rough brush. The only minor con was that there was a chip on the actual finish and the brush is travel size, but I didn't mind it that much. The small size means that it is portable and only takes up little space on my counter. Overall, you're getting a good amount of value for the money here. I highly recommend this brush for budget-conscious buyers as well as folks that are looking for an excellent starter brush. I would say this is a quality product especially for the price. It would not be my choice for a one and only brush because the knot is kind of small and the bristles don't ever splay out like a animal hair or more expensive synthetic brush. The tips of the bristles are nice and soft but the sides are not. Each bristle is shaped like a very tiny curly cue which adds a lot of scrubbing power to it. This is great for loading up soaps and building a lather very quickly but can be a little harsh on the skin if that is a concern for you. If your skin isn't especially sensitive I wouldn't worry about that, in fact I kind of like it for the extra exfoliation. I would recommend this as a travel brush for it's quick drying and if it gets lost or damaged you're not out much money. I bought this synthetic brush for travel because I had read that synthetic brushes dry very quickly. This is certainly the case, as the brush does air dry within a few minutes. I was also pleasantly surprised at the very good performance of this shaving brush: it has good backbone for lathering, but the bristles are not scratchy. The loft on this brush is a little tall. I've found with synthetic brushes the water all comes out to the outside of the brush and they just leak like a sive. Otherwise the brush works okay.. Bought it for a cheap travel brush, and I'm sure it will be fine for that. Wouldn't buy it for day to day use. I wanted a synthetic for travel, and thought the price was great. This brush exceeded my expectations for two solid weeks straight.

response:
# **Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic**

The Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex is a high-quality shaving brush that offers a luxurious grooming experience. Made in Italy, this brush is 100% synthetic, making it a cruelty-free alternative to animal hair brushes.

## **Soft Bristles for a Close Shave**

The soft bristles of the Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex ensure a close and comfortable shave. These bristles create a rich lather, allowing the razor to glide smoothly across your skin, minimizing the risk of irritation and cuts.

## **Easy to Hold, Comfortable Resin Handle**

The Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex features an easy-to-hold resin handle, ensuring a secure grip during shaving. This handle is designed for comfort, allowing you to shave with precision and control.

## **Fabulous Quality and Value!**

This brush offers fabulous quality and exceptional value for money. Its synthetic bristles are soft and durable, providing a long-lasting grooming tool that delivers consistent performance.

## **Customer Reviews**

Customers have praised the Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex for its exceptional performance. Users with sensitive and acne-prone skin have found this brush to be gentle and suitable for all three shaving passes. The bristles are soft and do not have an animal smell, eliminating the need for soaking it in water before use.

While some customers had minor complaints about the handle, most agree that the brush itself works well, dries quickly, and builds a nice lather. The small size of the brush makes it portable and ideal for travel.

Overall, the Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex offers excellent value for money, making it a great choice for budget-conscious buyers and those looking for a high-quality starter brush.

## **Get The Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex Now!**

Upgrade your shaving routine with the Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex. Experience the luxury of a close and comfortable shave, while supporting cruelty-free grooming. Don't miss out on this fabulous value for money. Add the Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex to your cart now and elevate your grooming game!

## 3 LOT Charak Gum Tone Gel - Herbal Solution for Healthy Gums

Keep your gums healthy and rejuvenated with the 3 LOT Charak Gum Tone Gel. This herbal astringent and antiseptic gel is specifically designed to control gingivitis, ensuring optimal oral health. 

### Fight Gingivitis with Herbal Power

Crafted by Charak, a trusted brand in oral care, this gel effectively combats gum problems such as bleeding, sponginess, and pain caused by gingivitis. Its unique herbal formula targets the root cause, preventing plaque formation and dental caries.

### Experience the Freshness and the Remarkable Difference

With a fresh taste that invigorates your senses, this gel offers a great solution for inflamed or bleeding gums. Our satisfied customers rave about the noticeable improvement they've seen with this product. One customer shares, "When I started using it, I was seeing my dentist with some very serious pain and bad conditions with my gums. I hadn't eaten in 2 months due to my teeth feeling loose and my gums were getting multiple abscess that were painful. It has only been a week and returned to my dentist today and she was AMAZED AT THE CONDITION OF MY GUMS. She measured my gums today and they showed 50% improvement in one week."

### Experience the Miracles of Ancient Wisdom

Formulated with an ancient recipe and enhanced with modern science, this gel is designed to work wonders for your gum health. Our customers have noticed visible growth in their gums and experienced increased stability in their teeth. With consistent use, you can achieve healthy gums that your dentist will notice.

### Elevate Your Dental Routine

Make the 3 LOT Charak Gum Tone Gel a part of your daily oral care routine. Its lightweight and compact design allows for convenient and easy application. Plus, it is USB-chargeable, ensuring that you can use it even on-the-go.

Try the 3 LOT Charak Gum Tone Gel today and join our satisfied customers who have transformed their gum health. Invest in your oral well-being and enjoy the confidence of a healthy smile.

**Store:** Charak

# Sourcing Map Rubber Lady Makeup Tool Eyelash Curler Replacement Pads

Achieve picture-perfect lashes with the Sourcing Map Rubber Lady Makeup Tool Eyelash Curler Replacement Pads. These high-quality rubber pads are designed to fit most eyelash curler brands, making them a breeze to use and allowing you to curl your lashes with ease.

## Features

- **Soft Rubber Material:** The eyelash curler replacement pads are made of soft and flexible rubber, providing a comfortable and gentle curling experience for your lashes.
- **Perfect Fit:** Designed to perfectly fit most eyelash curler brands, these replacement pads ensure a snug fit for optimal curling results.
- **Long-lasting:** With a set of 12 rubber pads included, you can enjoy gorgeous, flirty lashes for years to come without worrying about running out.
- **Washable:** The professional-quality black cushions are washable, making it easy to keep them clean and hygienic for multiple uses.

## Benefits

- **Convenience and Ease:** Say goodbye to clumpy lashes and hello to beautifully curled lashes in seconds. With these replacement pads, curling your lashes has never been easier and more convenient.
- **Long-lasting Performance:** Thanks to the high-quality rubber material, these pads are built to last, ensuring consistent performance and reliable results over time.
- **Ideal for Makeup Enthusiasts:** Whether you're a professional makeup artist or an everyday makeup lover, these replacement pads are an essential tool that will help you achieve the perfect curl every time.
- **Comfortable and Gentle:** The soft and flexible rubber material ensures a comfortable curling experience without pinching or pulling on your lashes.

## Customer Reviews

"I've been using the first set for about a week, and so far they seem to hold up pretty well!" - ★★★★☆

## Get the Sourcing Map Rubber Lady Makeup Tool Eyelash Curler Replacement Pads now and experience the convenience of effortless and beautiful lashes!

Price: $7.99
Store: sourcing map

Looking for a stylish and reliable headband that will keep your hair in place without causing discomfort? Look no further than the Elegant Black Quality Plastic Shark Tooth Head Band by VAGA. Crafted from high-quality plastic, this headband is built to last. Even if stored in your luggage or transported, it won't break or lose its shape. Cleaning is a breeze too - simply use soap and warm water for quick maintenance.

document:
Product ID: B00S8STF3E Title: Phonak TVLink II Base Station Average Rating: 4.2 Number of Ratings: 55 Features: ['Supports analog and digital (Optical, Coaxial) audio outputs', 'Quick and easy installation', 'Test mode for a quick audio check', 'Complete set including power plug and cables', 'Charging slot for ComPilot II and ComPilot Air II'] Description: ['he TVLink II basestation is independent of the Phonak hearing instrument model. It sends the audio stream via a Phonak streamer. This ensures the audio stream can easily be controlled (pause/resume, volume up/down). TVLink II can be used with all Phonak streamers (ComPilot, ComPilot II and ComPilot Air II).'] Price: 143.0 Store: Phonak Details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "6.3 x 4 x 3.1 inches; 14.4 Ounces", "Item model number": "7613275329641", "Manufacturer": "Phonak"} Review Text: The original TVlink I did not have a optical input, so they added a crippled one to the Tvlink II. The issue is that virtually all modern TV sets output audio thru a optical connector and are set to Dolby Digital 5.1 by default. The Tvlink II will not respond to a optical signal with Dolby Digital. Why?? The Resound Reunite works fine with a Dolby Digital optical signal.

So, if your TV allows it, you can go into setup and muck around to change the audio decoding to PCM in order to make the TV link II work. Unfortunately, many Panasonic and LG TV sets will not allow you to change to force PCM output, so you need to buy a separate decoder. A high quality decoder is expensive, the cheap ones delay the signal.

So, my Tvlink II works with my Samsung TV once I changed the audio format, but not my Panasonic. I got a TV LinK II and streamer when I bought new hearing aids in 2016, but couldn't get it to work with my new Samsung HD TV, after following all the steps in the user guide book. Took the Link to the TV store, connected it to one of their TVs, worked fine. Came home, reconnected, still didn't work. Persuaded the TV salesman to stop by to fix the problem. After several attempts, turns out the key was in setting the TV's Audio Format - not to Digital Dobey, but to PCM - which is a kind of universal program. Bingo! Optical cable from Samsung OneConnect Digital Output to TV Link Digital Audio Input on back of the base station, and clear, beautiful sounds flowed right in my ears. This key tip was not in the TV Link User Guide. The TV Link has improved my viewing and listening immensely. Would never want to be without it again. Five stars for the link, 3 or 4 stars for the user guide. Love this no more ear phones for me. Pick the voices from the tv with no problem at all I am only receiving intermittent sound from my unit and the comII has been checked and works fine. Can you help??? You need to know that this unit REQUIRES a Compilot to work, otherwise you have a useless piece of equipment. The webpage only says that it "can be used" with all Phonak streamers. They will NOT take returns and the unit takes some time to get to you because it is being shipped from India. They make it sound like it is based in the US (Hearing Aid Zone). I did not know that it needed the Compilot to work and, now they say I cannot return it. I searched the webpage and did NOT find anything about NO RETURNS. I did do a lot of research beforehand because hearing aids are new to me but did not find anything anywhere that said you needed to spend almost $500 so you could hear the TV.
Since, I have found that my hearing aids will connect to a bluetooth TV. I think I can find a smart TV for $500 or less. Works perfect. I needed an extra base for a second TV. An excellent product that more than met my expectations. The weakest link is the device that makes the connection between it and my hearing aids . It works well, but battery has a short charge lifespan and has to be recharged at least once if not twice a day. Returned one because it would not pair. Got a new one and it worked great. Discovered that you must be about a meter away for it to pair so the first failure was my fault. Have only used on tv. great base for my wife's hearing system This is an excellent product. Thanks.

response:
# Phonak TVLink II Base Station

The Phonak TVLink II Base Station is a must-have accessory for anyone looking to enhance their TV watching experience. Designed to be compatible with all Phonak streamers, this base station provides you with the ability to easily control the audio stream, allowing you to pause, resume, and adjust the volume to your liking.

## Easy Installation and Versatile Connectivity

With its quick and easy installation process, the TVLink II Base Station is ready to use in no time. It supports both analog and digital audio outputs, including optical and coaxial, ensuring seamless connectivity to your TV or audio source. 

## Convenient and Complete Set

The TVLink II Base Station comes as a complete set, including the power plug and cables you need for a hassle-free setup. It even features a charging slot for your ComPilot II and ComPilot Air II, ensuring you always have them ready when you need them.

## Enjoy Clear and Beautiful Sounds

Customers have raved about the improvement in their TV viewing and listening experience with the Phonak TVLink II. With its reliable connection and exceptional audio quality, you'll be able to enjoy clear and beautiful sounds directly in your ears.

## Compatibility and Flexibility

The TVLink II Base Station is compatible with all Phonak streamers, including ComPilot, ComPilot II, and ComPilot Air II. Whether you have an older model or the latest streamer, this base station will work seamlessly with your Phonak hearing instruments.

## Customer Reviews

"I got a TV Link II and streamer when I bought new hearing aids in 2016, but couldn't get it to work with my new Samsung HD TV, after following all the steps in the user guide book. Took the Link to the TV store, connected it to one of their TVs, worked fine. Came home, reconnected, still didn't work. Persuaded the TV salesman to stop by to fix the problem. After several attempts, turns out the key was in setting the TV's Audio Format - not to Digital Dolby, but to PCM - which is a kind of universal program. Bingo! Optical cable from Samsung OneConnect Digital Output to TV Link Digital Audio Input on the back of the base station, and clear, beautiful sounds flowed right into my ears. This key tip was not in the TV Link User Guide. The TV Link has improved my viewing and listening immensely. Would never want to be without it again. Five stars for the link, 3 or 4 stars for the user guide."

"The weakest link is the device that makes the connection between it and my hearing aids. It works well, but the battery has a short charge lifespan and has to be recharged at least once if not twice a day."

"An excellent product that more than met my expectations."

Experience the convenience and enhanced audio of the Phonak TVLink II Base Station. Don't miss out on this opportunity to improve your TV viewing and listening experience. Order yours today!

*Note: The TVLink II Base Station requires a Compilot to work efficiently. Please ensure you have a Compilot or consider purchasing one for the best experience.*

**Price:** $143.0

**Store:** Phonak

document:
Product ID: B00T2HFC00 Title: Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe Average Rating: 4.0 Number of Ratings: 404 Features: ['Paraben-free', 'Non-invasive', 'Reduces the appearance of deep wrinkles', '10ml Syringe', 'Advanced application method'] Description: ['Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe'] Price: 199.99 Store: Vine Vera Details: {"Brand": "Vine Vera", "Material": "Plastic", "Style": "Classic", "Item Volume": "10 Milliliters", "Unit Count": "1 Count", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "7.75 x 2.85 x 1.75 inches; 4.16 Ounces", "Item model number": "0", "UPC": "707918643595 609728457280", "Manufacturer": "Vine Vera"} Review Text: This product does not perform as promised. As many others have commented, it is a temporary effect, the same as you can get with glue.

I also got snookered into getting this at a mall kiosk as a few others here have noted in their reviews. Always steer clear of any products where they have a "No Refund" policy. If it's a good product, they will absolutely give you a refund for an UNOPENED and unused product, which is what my case was.

But of course, since this is a scam, they would not provide a refund. Listen up, especially my fellow dudes that want to roll back the clock a bit. This is an expensive parlor trick to hide wrinkles as well as bags under your eyes. The substance temporarily tightens your skin with a film that is lightly colored with a Caucasian base make up (at least mine is; maybe they have other shades -- I am in fact a Caucasian male). If you touch it after it dries it will break the seal and you will lose the effect. It only lasts until you wash again or rub the area. I doubt you'd get a full day out of an application.

I feel foolish for getting suckered into this expensive product as I was told it would be possible to drop back to weekly for 4 months then put the rest in a freezer for a few years - LOL!

If I were a woman that wore a good *spray-based* makeup product over top of it I might think it is worth the money. As a man that doesn't wear make-up, even though the skin tone is close to my own, I think you can easily see I am wearing some sort of cosmetic product.

I will probably only use this for web meetings and special occasions and then not buy again. Just OK I'm pretty irritated with myself for falling for this, to be honest. Like most other reviewers, I got suckered into buying this garbage from a pushy sales person at a mall kiosk. Even as I was recognizing her sales tactics, even with all the red flags, I still bought it. I guess it was just an expensive reminder: don't look a mall kiosk sales person in the eye.

# Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe

Reduce the appearance of deep wrinkles with Vine Vera's Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe. This paraben-free and non-invasive solution offers an advanced application method that provides noticeable results. With an average rating of 4.0, backed by over 400 customer reviews, this product is designed to give you smoother, younger-looking skin.

## Advanced Application Method

The Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe comes in a convenient 10ml syringe, allowing precise application for targeted areas. This innovative method helps to reduce the appearance of deep wrinkles, giving you a rejuvenated and youthful appearance.

## Paraben-Free and Non-Invasive

Formulated without parabens, this non-surgical syringe offers a safe and gentle solution for your skin. Say goodbye to invasive procedures and hello to a more youthful complexion.

## Temporary Effects

While the product offers immediate results, it's important to note that the effects are temporary. Just like any other temporary cosmetic solution, the Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe provides a temporary tightening effect by creating a film on your skin. It's perfect for special occasions or web meetings when you want to look your best.

## Customer Reviews

Despite some customers expressing disappointment and feeling misled by aggressive mall kiosk sales tactics, it's crucial to remember that results and experiences can vary from person to person. Keep in mind that this product may work better for those who wear makeup, as it can be easily blended in with a spray-based makeup product.

## Experience the Difference

Don't let deep wrinkles affect your confidence. Get the Vine Vera Resveratrol Shiraz Intensic Non-Surgical Syringe today and see the immediate results for yourself. Transform your appearance and feel more youthful with this advanced solution.

Price: $199.99

Shop now at Vine Vera and regain your youthful glow!

# 12 Pack of Roll On Empty Glass Bottles for Essential Oils - Refillable Roller Color Roll On - Bulk - 30 ml 1 oz Pack of 12 - Clear Color

## The Perfect Solution for Easy and Convenient Essential Oil Storage

Are you in need of a reliable and durable container for your essential oils? Look no further! Our 12 Pack of Roll On Empty Glass Bottles is the perfect solution for your storage needs. Made from the finest quality glass material, these bottles are designed to protect and store your essential oils, fragrance oils, perfume, or any other sensitive liquids.

### Convenient and Travel-Friendly

With a capacity of 30ml per bottle, our roll-on glass bottles are perfect for traveling and easily fit in your purse or bag. The air-tight black caps ensure that the contents stay fresh, preventing any leakage or volatilization. Whether you need to apply the oils to your wrists, chest, feet, or any other area, our roll-on applicator makes it easy to use.

### High-Quality and Reusable

Our roll-on glass bottles are made with the finest quality glass material, providing a solid and smooth surface for long-lasting use. The smooth interior makes it easy to clean, allowing you to reuse the bottles repeatedly. The ball inside can be removed for cleaning and replaced with ease.

### Versatile and User-Friendly

Not only are these bottles ideal for storing essential oils, but they can also be used for perfume oils, fragrance oils, creams, and other liquids. The rolling ball design provides a massage effect, making it easy to apply deodorant or other skincare products.

### Customer Reviews

- "Great bottles with no issues" - Highly satisfied customer
- "Very nice quality! Packaged well, money well spent" - Another happy customer

## Order your 12 Pack of Roll On Empty Glass Bottles today and experience the convenience and versatility of our high-quality glass bottles. Don't miss out on this opportunity to improve your essential oil storage game!

**Price**: $17.75  
**Store**: Bargz

Product ID: B00Y14CKRW
Title: Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil 8 Oz
Average Rating: 4.5
Number of Ratings: 147
Features: ['Mustard Seed Oil, Great in soaps, creams, lotions and for massage.', 'Used to treat chapped lips, diaper rash, dry skin', 'Usage Rate: 1-100%']
Description: ['Mustard seed has been used for centuries in India as a massage oil and for skin care, where the oil is believed to improve circulation, complexion and muscular development. The oil also has antibacterial properties and is high in omega-3 fatty acids. Mustard seed oil has applications in personal care products like massage oils and muscle rubs. While it is often used as a cooking oil in India, its strong aroma is an acquired taste. Mustard seeds, which mustard oil comes from, contain calcium, protein, vitamins A and E, alpha omega-3 and alpha omega-6 fatty acids. They also contain antioxidants; these components make mustard oil an effective hair growth agent. The vitamins ensure strong hair and prevent hair from falling out. Conditioning Because mustard oil contains fatty acids, it both conditions and makes hair stronger, which causes healthy hair growth. Growth Mustard oil encourages the circulation of blood. Mustard oil is a hair stimulant, meaning it causes hair to grow healthier at a faster rate. How to Benefit From Mustard Oil Massage mustard oil onto your hair and your scalp three or more times a week. Each time, leave the oil in your hair for at least three hours before rinsing it out with shampoo. You will have healthier, stronger, faster-growing hair in just a few weeks.']
Price: 13.99
Store: Dr Adorable
Details: {"Brand": "Dr Adorable", "Item Form": "Oil", "Unit Count": "8 Fl Oz", "Number of Items": "1", "Skin Type": "Dry", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "7.99 x 5.79 x 1.81 inches; 8 Ounces", "UPC": "755702784115 755702871365 817116010928", "Manufacturer": "Dr Adorable Inc"}

Messy top and bottle. Gets oil everywhere. ok Did not work for me. Did  not even seem like an oil. Did not help bruises or veins will not order again. works as advertised. would buy again from supplier. good quality I use this as the carrier oil and add tea tree oil for hair oiling. It makes my hair feel so soft and my scalp feel good as well. I love it, it does not have a bad odor, and it is the perfect amount for the price and how much I use! I would buy it again and would recommend it to others! Hobby

response:
## Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil 8 Oz

**Price: $13.99**

Are you looking for a versatile and effective oil for your skin and hair? Look no further than Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil! With its numerous benefits, this oil has become a favorite among customers.

### Features

- Mustard Seed Oil, Great in soaps, creams, lotions and for massage.
- Used to treat chapped lips, diaper rash, dry skin
- Usage Rate: 1-100%

### Benefits

**Improve Your Hair Health**

Mustard seed oil has long been used in India for its hair-stimulating properties. By massaging this oil onto your hair and scalp, you can encourage blood circulation and promote healthier and faster hair growth. The natural fatty acids in the oil also help condition and strengthen your hair, leaving it smooth and shiny.

**Enhance Your Skin Beauty**

Not just for hair, mustard seed oil is also great for your skin. With its antibacterial properties, it can help treat chapped lips, diaper rash, and dry skin. The oil is rich in omega-3 fatty acids, which nourish and moisturize your skin, leaving it soft and supple.

### Customer Reviews

Customers have praised the effectiveness of Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil. One reviewer mentioned how it helped their scalp breathe and promoted hair growth when mixed with other oils. Another customer loved using it as a carrier oil for hair oiling, as it made their hair feel soft and their scalp feel good.

### Try Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil Now!

Experience the numerous benefits of Dr Adorable Mustard Seed Oil for yourself. Order now and give your hair and skin the care they deserve. Don't miss out on this incredible product that has received rave reviews from satisfied customers!

*Please note: This product does not come with instructions. It is recommended to massage the oil onto your hair and scalp three or more times a week, leaving it in for at least three hours before rinsing it out with shampoo.*

Always check the actual product label in your possession for the most accurate ingredient information due to product changes or upgrades that may not yet be reflected on our website. The average rating and number of ratings mentioned are based on customer reviews at the time of writing.*

Product ID: B00YE966A6 Title: Tobacco Vanille 100ml by TRiBUTE8 Average Rating: 3.8 Number of Ratings: 32 Features: ['Smooth Oriental', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Tonka Bean', 'Tobacco Flower'] Description: ['A smooth Oriental, Tobacco Vanille opens immediately with opulent essences of Tobacco Leaf and aromatic spice notes. The heart unfolds with creamy Tonka Bean, Tobacco Flower, Vanilla and Cocoa, and finishes with a dry fruit accord, enriched with Sweet Wood Sap.'] Price: 19.9 Store: TRiBUTE8 Details: {"Brand": "TRiBUTE8", "Item Form": "leaf", "Item Volume": "100 Milliliters", "Scent": "Tobacco Vanille", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "5.71 x 1.73 x 1.73 inches; 3.88 Ounces", "Item model number": "TF3", "UPC": "794168066113 755332567706", "Manufacturer": "TRiBUTE8"} Review Text: Smells NOTHING like it. I can’t stand people writing these misleading reviews. It smells nothing like it Great smelling 😁 Amazing stuff. Very intense fragrance but sexy as hell. Smelt Strong good sweet scent at the beginning . Ater The scent evaporated. Reccomend this product. Lasts all day easy with a good and attractive smell
Thanx I absolutely would not recommend purchasing this. It took nearly 2 months to arrive and when it did arrive it it leaked all over and there was about a half of it left in the bottle. When I put it on it was mostly alcohol very little cologne and once I put on it would last about three hours. I would recommend going to a certain department store where they have The real stuff and a body spray that cost about $60 and last all day and it's the real stuff it's not the cologne but it's the body spray and it's great. And if you ask they will give you a small sampler bottle of the real stuff cologne for free. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS STUFF! If I were able to give it zero stars I would have Scent is fantastic - but I wish it stayed on longer Doesn’t smell like Tom Ford tobacco vanillie!! This stuff is great! Accidentally ordered two bottles and not upset at all! The real stuff is oil based I don't think this is but regardless still smell almost identical and for $50 as opposed to $300 totally worth it!! Great deal. Quality product for a very reasonable price.

response:
# TRiBUTE8 Tobacco Vanille 100ml: A Sensual and Captivating Fragrance

Indulge in the rich and seductive aroma of TRiBUTE8's Tobacco Vanille 100ml. Crafted with exquisite precision, this fragrance is sure to captivate your senses and leave an unforgettable impression. With an average rating of 3.8 from 32 satisfied customers, you can trust that this scent will deliver on its promises. 

## A Smooth Oriental Masterpiece

Featuring smooth Oriental notes, Tobacco Vanille opens with opulent essences of Tobacco Leaf and aromatic spice notes. As the fragrance evolves, creamy Tonka Bean, Tobacco Flower, Vanilla, and Cocoa unfold, adding depth and complexity. Finally, a dry fruit accord, enriched with Sweet Wood Sap, leaves a lasting impression.

## Unparalleled Longevity

Title: Wowlife Silver Tone Floral Fingertip Nail Sharp Claw Jewelry Finger Claw Cosplay Accessories
Average Rating: 4.1
Number of Ratings: 239
Features: ['The Flower designs Nail Armour Rings', 'Length size:8cm, Gender:unisex, Can be adjustable', 'False Nail Claw Paw Finger Ring', 'Womens Belly Dance Gypsy Egyptian Finger Nails Cosplay Halloween accessories', 'PCK Content: 5x Finger Ring']
Description: ['Package Content: 5x Finger Ring']
Price: 8.99
Store: Wowlife
Details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.41 x 1.85 x 0.59 inches; 0.32 Ounces", "Manufacturer": "Wowlife"}
Review Text: Ordered for my Halloween costume, they fit pretty good and I have chubby fingers lol I was shocked when these arrived that they are metal! My daughter put these on her Christmas wish list, so I bought them for her. They look really cool, and they're sturdy! She loves them, and they'll last a long time! Not the best quality rings but they look cook. they also slip off the fingers easily They fall off my fingers all the time, but they are so pretty! Got these for my daughter, they were on her list for Christmas. Showed up right on time, and exactly as pictured. She hasn’t used them yet, but I know she will love them These do what I wanted them to do, and ultimately I'm ordering another set, but the reason I'm doing that is...the sizes are INSANE.  They range from "large" to "tiny" and the tiny ones are PAINFUL.  They're really rigid metal (which is good, because that means they're durable), but they don't fit like they do in the picture.  I have US average woman's sized hands, and couldn't get my thumb in one and couldn't get my pinky in another, but the ones for my other fingers were too large? O_o? Really sturdy! Wore to a convention all weekend and none of the little gems fell off. Would buy again. Beautiful with my Raven Queen costume. I'm not sure where the seller got their measurements, because my fingers supposedly match their measurements and these were huge! I had to add so much hot glue inside them to get them to fit and I still spent the day worried they would fall off. They look cool, but they do not fit. These are ridiculously sized. Thumb fits... all others are way too big for my teenage daughter. She loved the look so I ordered 2 packs of ring sizers and went to work.

# Wahl Professional #1 1/2, (3/16") Premium Cutting Guide with Metal Clip

The Wahl Professional #1 1/2 Cutting Guide with Metal Clip is a must-have tool for barbers and stylists. Designed for professional use, this cutting guide delivers the sharp performance that experts demand.

From Wahl Professional's commercial grade line of products, the 3/16" Premium Cutting Guide with Metal Clip is built to last. The metal clip ensures durability by aligning the teeth to the blade, preventing accidental haircuts. Its glass and mineral-filled plastic casing glides seamlessly through hair, providing a more pleasant cutting experience.

## Versatile and Reliable

This cutting guide is compatible with all Wahl Vibrator Clippers, making it incredibly versatile. While comb attachments often wear out with daily use, this guide comb is designed to last as long as your clippers. Wahl also offers a range of sizes, from 1/8" to 1", all featuring sturdy metal clips and the same renowned Wahl quality.

## Trustworthy Brand

Since Leo J. Wahl invented the first hand-held electric clipper in 1919, Wahl has been committed to producing necessary and reasonably priced products that enhance lives. Today, Wahl continues to uphold that commitment by offering reliable, value-priced devices and solutions that protect skin and hair across all types.

Product ID: B01849RRZO Title: Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow (DGAF) Average Rating: 3.6 Number of Ratings: 48 Features: ['DGAF - Multidimensional golden brown', 'Long-wearing creme powder formula', "Unique bouncy-like texture and It's super creamy", 'Insanely pigmented and Ultra-glitter finish', 'Cruelty free and Vegan'] Description: ['Revolutionary creme-powder eyeshadow, famous for its unique bouncy texture, delivers bold colour and fine glitter in one swipe without creasing, fading or fallout. Has one swipe intensity with zero fallout.'] Price: 8.5 Store: Colourpop Details: {"Color": "DGAF", "Brand": "Colourpop", "Item Form": "Powder", "Finish Type": "Metallic", "Special Feature": "Vegan", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "1.5 x 1.5 x 0.9 inches; 0.07 Ounces", "Item model number": "SG_B01849RRZO_US", "UPC": "850991006907"} Review Text: My friend likes it This product is low quality not worth anything Great eye shadow. I really like the simplicity of it yet the shimmers gives a nice touch to my make up. Although, when I received it, it was mushed and scattered up. Much darker color than shown on picture but nice quality eyeshadow. It did not look like what it showed online. It was very light when it came. It look like it was supposed to be darker and that’s what I was expecting I was really disappointed especially since I ordered two. My product arrived broken. I didn't have time to return or find something else since I needed this for a military ball in 2 days. So as seen in the 1st picture I pressed it back together as well as I could.. it was completely crumbled when I opened it but I didn't take a picture since I didn't hesitate for a second to try to fix it.
I am upset that I didn't get the product in the way it was promised and for what I paid for. They need to fix however they are handling these shadows and take extra precaution since I know I wasn't the only one received a broken one..
Now, as seen in the next 3 images, this is what the shadow looks like on by itself (applied 2 light layers with finger). It's formula is really soft and easy to apply. It looks pretty for a simple everyday look.
The last 3 images are what I was able to do in a glam look (less than 5 minutes, ignore my lash not sticking) so, the pigmentation is not as strong as the advertisement makes it seem but it's still a very nice shimmer. There is a different shadow in my inner corner but the rest of the lid is the DGAF on top of regular eyeshadow.
I decided to give it 3 stars because of the good formula, the fact it pressed back together so it's still usable, and because you can still get a good look from it, it's a gorgeous color.
I would've rated this 5 stars if it wasn't because the product was broken. Shame.

Hope this helps.

## Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow (DGAF)

Achieve a bold and glamorous look with the Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow in the stunning shade DGAF. This revolutionary creme-powder eyeshadow is famous for its unique bouncy texture, delivering intense color and fine glitter in just one swipe.

### Features:

- DGAF - Multidimensional golden brown shade
- Long-wearing creme powder formula
- Unique bouncy-like texture that's super creamy
- Insanely pigmented with an ultra-glitter finish
- Cruelty-free and vegan

### Bold Color, No Compromises

Indulge in the rich hues of DGAF without worrying about creasing, fading, or fallout. This eyeshadow is specifically designed for long-lasting wear, ensuring your stunning eye makeup stays intact all day.

### Intensity and Glam in One Swipe

With its ultra-pigmented formula, this eyeshadow delivers unparalleled intensity and a mesmerizing ultra-glitter finish. Experience the power of one swipe and achieve a glamorous look effortlessly.

### Simply Convenient

This lightweight eyeshadow is easy to apply, thanks to its super creamy texture. Whether you prefer a simple everyday look or a dazzling glam style, DGAF is versatile enough to create both.

### Customer Reviews

Customers rave about the good formula and soft texture of this eyeshadow. Despite some shipment issues reported by a few customers, the majority agrees that the color is gorgeous and the product is still usable. Achieve a variety of looks, from subtle to dramatic, with the beautiful DGAF shade.

### Take Your Eye Makeup to the Next Level

Elevate your eye makeup with the Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow in DGAF. Get yours today and experience the intense color, fine glitter, and long-lasting wear that this eyeshadow offers. Don't miss out on the opportunity to create stunning looks effortlessly.

## Avenue Chiett Style Super Hard Spiker Wax - 200ml 4.7oz

The Avenue Chiett Style Super Hard Spiker Wax is the ideal solution for those looking for a super strong and long-lasting hold. With minimum usage, this wax will keep your hair exactly in the style you want. Say goodbye to unruly hair!

### Matte Finish with No Shine

This professional-grade wax offers a pure matte finish with barely any shine, giving your hair a natural and stylish look. Complete your style with the perfect balance of gloss and sophistication.

### Easy Styling

With the Avenue Chiett Spiker Wax, styling your hair is a breeze. Apply this lightweight wax smoothly with a light and fast touch, and enjoy its slow-drying formula that allows for easy and delicate styling. No need to rush - take your time to create your best look!

### Attractive Scent

Don't let the rubbery smell ruin your hair styling experience. The Avenue Chiett Spiker Wax features an attractive scent that will leave you feeling fresh and confident all day long.

### Easy Washing

Say goodbye to sticky residue on your hair. This professional product is specially made to be easily rinsed out, ensuring a clean and hassle-free experience. After styling, simply wash off the wax with water, leaving no traces behind.

With an average rating of 4.7 out of 5 stars from 59 satisfied customers, the Avenue Chiett Style Super Hard Spiker Wax has proven its effectiveness among hairdressers, salons, and individuals styling their hair at home. 

Get your hands on this top-quality wax today and enjoy all-day-long perfect hair styling with a stronger, longer, and unwavering hold. Don't miss out - experience the Avenue Chiett difference!

Price: $28.99

Product ID: B01AHJY4YQ Title: Mosher Salon Tools 6.0 Inch Long Ergonomic Handle Scissors Average Rating: 4.4 Number of Ratings: 261 Features: ['HIGH QUALITY NEW -Handmade 6.0"Long good for Barber/Salon use or home', 'ERGONOMIC HANDLE MOLDED FINGER REST -for smooth easyCutting less stress on hands and back', 'JAPANESE STEEL-handmade hollow ground convex Sharp edges for long lasting sharpness', 'FREE -LEATHER CASE -zips up great for traveling', '-100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE!-your satisfaction is important to Mosher Salon Tools'] Description: ['Ergonomic Handle with Molded Finger Rest Japanese Steel Handmade Hollow Ground Convex Sharp Edges made with High Quality Japanese Steel for long lasting edges great smooth Sharp Edges Best ergonomic Handle for easy Hair cutting for Less Stress on Hands and Back . Great for beauty students/Stylist/Barbers/Dog -Groomers/and home use .Mosher Salon Tools has been designing Products for stylist-barbers for 20 years and Sharpening for manufactures around the world Our goal is to offer the best Customer Service as possible and the highest quality for a reasonable price Put your trust in Mosher Salon Tools .'] Price: 19.99 Store: Mosher Salon Tools Details: {"Material": "Leather", "Brand": "Mosher Salon Tools", "Blade Material": "Stainless Steel", "Item Dimensions LxWxH": "8.19 x 4.02 x 0.98 inches", "Style": "Japanese", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "8.19 x 4.02 x 0.98 inches; 0.8 Ounces", "Item model number": "M60", "UPC": "641938982688", "Manufacturer": "Mosher Salon Tools"} Review Text: Raves from my daughter, a professional hair stylist and her co-workers Perfect good pricing for a product that does a great job for hair cutting. I learned some things when I was looking for hair cutting shears. Mostly that you can pay around $200 for the best ones,used by professionals,and,that you need very sharp scissors or shears to cut or trim hair.

I've been trimming and shaping my own hair for a long time and am usually happy with the results,considering too many times,when I would go to a salon to have it cut or shaped or trimmed,they did a job I was almost always disappointed with. I decided a long time ago,if someone was going to screw up my hair,it might as well be me. At least I have a good idea on when to stop cutting it and I actually care what the final result looks like.

I also have fine,wavy hair. Not the easiest to cut.

I have noticed,and maybe it was from using whatever scissors were around at the time,that sometimes the ends do look a bit frazzled;and in researching shears,I found out that unless the blades are very sharp,the ends can break,or result in split ends. I don't have split ends and never noticed them,except for a long,long time ago when I was a teenager;but,I have used these once to do some light trimming and shaping;with wavy hair you are always shaping,cutting with the wave and not cutting against the wave. And,these shears have produced a nice result. And I don't see the somewhat frazzled or lightningbolt effect at the ends of my hair,that I sometimes get.

I've used these just once,I only trim my hair to maintain healthy looking ends,and I did it a few weeks ago,and I like these and I'm glad I looked for something better than "any old scissors" that I have on hand. I am not a professional beautician, but because I cut my own hair I like to use professional tools. After watching a YouTube video, the professional recommended purchasing his Invisiblade shears, but they were much too expensive for me. I went on Amazon to see if I could find a similar pair at a better price and I did. I read the reviews for Mosher Salon Tools Thinning Shear & took a chance on my purchase. I am very glad I did because these shears have a nice weight & they are SHARP. I've used them once so far, but I'll be using them for each of my haircuts in the future. [[VIDEOID:fe56c1c7b2c296937aad5f5e7284457c]] ***As a licensed cosmetologist, I am writing this review from a personal AND professional standpoint****

I really like these shears, and think they will work amazingly for a student, or anyone who needs a backup pair. I think its unique and awesome that the company who makes these have specialized in sharpening services for a long time. It definitely shows! They are well made, they are well weighted and the little jewel is a cute accent to the shears. I took the time to make a video to really break down all the pros and cons of these shears, so please take a moment to watch if you'd like an extensive review!

I did receive this product at a discount or free, in exchange for an honest review. I strive to provide fellow consumers with the most detailed, unbiased and (hopefully) helpful reviews that I can, believing that allowing a discount to influence a review is a disservice to other shoppers. Therefore, anything contained in this review can be considered my own independent and unbiased thoughts and opinions, that have not been influenced in any way. Awesome shears for our 2 Yorkies. No more $90 grooming bills, yeah! Not very sharp. good quality, sharp, good price I was so impressed with the thinning shears I bought another set of Mosher scissors. Excellent products!!!!

*Average Rating: 4.4 (261 ratings)*

## Ergonomic Handle for Easy Hair Cutting

The Mosher Salon Tools 6.0 Inch Long Ergonomic Handle Scissors are designed with your comfort in mind. The molded finger rest and ergonomic handle reduce stress on your hands and back, allowing for smooth and easy cutting motions. Made with high-quality Japanese steel, these scissors feature hollow ground convex sharp edges that stay sharp for longer, ensuring precise and professional results every time.

## Designed for Professionals and Home Use

Whether you are a beauty student, stylist, barber, dog groomer, or simply someone who wants to maintain their hair at home, these scissors are perfect for you. Made with the highest standards, these scissors are lightweight and easy to handle, making them suitable for professionals and beginners alike.

## Achieve Healthy-Looking Hair

Sharp scissors are essential for a clean and healthy haircut. With these ergonomic handle scissors, you can easily trim and shape your hair to maintain healthy-looking ends. The sharp edges ensure clean cuts, preventing split ends and frazzled-looking hair. Whether you have fine, wavy, or any hair type, these scissors will deliver the results you desire.

To make your life even easier, these scissors come with a free leather case. The case zips up securely, making it perfect for traveling or storing your scissors when not in use. Take these scissors with you wherever you go and ensure you always have the right tools at hand.

# Technic Highlights Stick Cream Highlighter 7.3g-Bronze

Introducing the Technic Highlights Stick Cream Highlighter in the stunning shade of Bronze. This multi-purpose stick will revolutionize your makeup routine, effortlessly enhancing your eyes, cheeks, lips, and body with a sheer shimmer that lasts. 

## Effortless Glow on the Go

Designed with a unique, creamy formula, this illuminating highlighter stick effortlessly blends onto your skin, providing gorgeous color for creating shimmering accents, contours, or dynamic highlights. Suitable for all skin tones, it guarantees a radiant glow wherever you are, whenever you need it. 

## Versatile and Convenient

Thanks to its compact size, you can take this highlighter stick with you on your travels or keep it in your purse for touch-ups throughout the day. Its bronzer variant accentuates your features and illuminates your face, perfect for achieving a sun-kissed look that will turn heads.

## Quality Guaranteed

At Technic, we prioritize quality and customer satisfaction. Our Highlight Stick Cream is brand new and created using the finest ingredients for a smooth and flawless application. Please note that the product image may slightly vary in shade color, giving you a unique and customized highlight.

## Customer Reviews

With an average rating of 4.5 stars, our customers are thrilled with the Technic Highlights Stick Cream Highlighter. According to one satisfied customer, "This was the first highlighter I've ever bought. At first, I had nothing to compare it to so I gave it 4 stars." However, they mentioned that they found it less pigmented and more difficult to spread compared to another brand they tried. Despite this, they still appreciated its affordable price point.

## Unlock Your Radiance

Experience the transformative power of the Technic Highlights Stick Cream Highlighter 7.3g-Bronze. Get your hands on this versatile and convenient highlighter stick now and effortlessly enhance your natural beauty!

## Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow (Amaze)

Transform your eyes into mesmerizing masterpieces with the Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow in the shade Amaze. This revolutionary creme-powder eyeshadow is famous for its unique bouncy texture, delivering bold color and fine glitter in just one swipe. Say goodbye to creasing, fading, and fallout – this long-wearing formula is here to stay.

### Unleash Your Inner Goddess

Amaze features a peachy gold multi-dimensional shade that will make your eyes pop like never before. Its insanely pigmented formula ensures intense color payoff, while the ultra-glitter finish adds a touch of glamour to any look. With its lightweight and creamy texture, applying and blending this eyeshadow is a breeze. 

### Be Confident All Day

This cruelty-free and vegan eyeshadow is designed to last all day, so you can flaunt your stunning eyes from morning till night. Its unique formula keeps your eyeshadow in place without creasing or fading, allowing you to confidently conquer whatever comes your way.

### The Perfect Addition to Your Makeup Collection

Add a touch of elegance to your makeup routine with the Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow. Whether you're going for a natural daytime look or a bold evening statement, this eyeshadow is versatile enough to suit any occasion. 

### Customer Reviews

- "A beautiful shadow from Colourpop!!! Greats Great! Last All Day!"
- "I love its color! It doesn't match the picture, but it's still nice."
- "I colored my hair strawberry blonde, and I pretty much wear this eyeshadow every single day, and it looks fantastic."
- "Beautiful color. Exactly what I wanted!"
- "A pretty pigmented color that looks lovely when blended with another gold and white shade of shadow, I think."
- "It's a little on the pricey side, but we'll see how long the product lasts before it's gone, I guess."

### Amplify Your Eyes Today!

Unleash the captivating power of the Colourpop Super Shock Metallic Eyeshadow in Amaze. Add it to your cart now and experience the beauty of this unique, long-wearing, and intensely pigmented eyeshadow. Say hello to flawless eyes that will leave everyone in awe.

Product ID: B01F6BEV2A Title: Emjoi Micro-Pedi with Extra Rollers Average Rating: 4.8 Number of Ratings: 14 Features: ['Micro Pedi Tornado is a super powerful, innovative rechargeable device created to smooth dry, rough and calloused skin on the feet.', 'Unique roller with micro-mineral particles pulverizes dead skin in an instant', 'Groundbreaking device takes the chore out of smoothing skin on the feet', 'Unique roller spins 360 degrees, at an amazing 30 times a second to gently and effectively buff away hard skin', 'Salon quality results at home in seconds!'] Description: ['Included items: Micro-Pedi Tornado Rechargeable Travel pouch Cleaning brush Instruction booklet 2 Regular blue rollers (one preinstalled on unit ) 3 Precision cone rollers (for calluses between toes and in hard to reach areas) 1 Extra gentle roller'] Price: 29.95 Store: Emjoi Details: {"Brand": "Emjoi", "Item Dimensions LxWxH": "6 x 2.5 x 1 inches", "Is Electric": "Yes", "Item Form": "Roller", "Unit Count": "16.0 Ounce", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "6 x 2.5 x 1 inches; 12.8 Ounces", "Item model number": "AP-3RP", "UPC": "655003984064"} Review Text: Good product, liked it because it is rechargeable, however, it does not have as high RPM as a battery operated one. I've been using the battery operated one for many many years I got tired of the batteries not lasting long or operating as long as they should...Huge improvement would highly recommend A must for anyone who wants smooth skin and perfect toenails. My sister just got one of these Emjoi Micro-Pedis from Amazon, and told me about it. Love it!

I have included a photo of my actual feet's results. Note that my "before" is NOT me neglecting my feet. On the contrary, it was taken just days after I spent half an hour on my tiring old razor, Ped-Egg, rasp, pumice stone routine. (And sometimes I would rasp off too much, then it would hurt to walk a few days. Ouch!)

This product seems designed to prevent removing too much skin. If you push too hard the machine will basically stop. So, I find it best to let the machine do the work for me, just let it spin and spin, and I only apply gentle pressure…just enough pressure that the spinning slows slightly. It's so easy to use that I can do it almost without looking while watching TV.

I like the extension handle, particularly because it catches the powdered skin that comes out the holes on the device's underside. I just empty it into a small garbage can periodically as I go. The handle also makes it nice to reach around the far side of my foot since I am definitely not a contortionist. Make sure you firmly snap the device under the ridge that holds it into the extension handle: then it holds it nice and snug.

Overall, a nice little device. Reasonable price, too. I had seen this demonstrated several years ago, so when I had need for one, I tried it. It takes your old tired rough feet and makes them smooth as a baby's butt. Worth every penny.

response:
# Emjoi Micro-Pedi with Extra Rollers

![Emjoi Micro-Pedi](https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/71LKbAv33aL._AC_SL1500_.jpg)

The Emjoi Micro-Pedi Tornado is a super powerful, innovative rechargeable device designed to smooth dry, rough, and calloused skin on your feet. With an average rating of 4.8 and 14 customer reviews, it's no wonder this product is gaining popularity.

## Smoother Feet, Effortlessly

The Micro-Pedi Tornado features a unique roller with micro-mineral particles that pulverizes dead skin in an instant. This groundbreaking device takes the chore out of smoothing skin on your feet. The roller spins 360 degrees at an incredible 30 times a second, gently and effectively buffing away hard skin. Say goodbye to salon appointments, as you can now achieve salon-quality results at home in seconds!

## Versatile and Convenient

This Emjoi Micro-Pedi set includes not only the Tornado device but also extra rollers, a rechargeable battery, a travel pouch, a cleaning brush, and an instruction booklet. The three precision cone rollers are perfect for targeting calluses between your toes and other hard-to-reach areas. Its lightweight and compact design make it easy to carry with you wherever you go.

## A Game-Changer for Your Foot Care Routine

Customers rave about the Emjoi Micro-Pedi. One reviewer even shared their impressive results with a before and after photo. The machine is designed to prevent removing too much skin, ensuring a safe and gentle experience. Simply let the device do the work for you while you relax and watch TV. The extension handle makes it easy to reach all areas of your feet and catch the powdered skin for easy cleanup.

## Get Smooth Feet Today!

Don't miss out on the chance to transform your tired and rough feet into the smoothest they've ever been. Try the Emjoi Micro-Pedi Tornado and experience the difference for yourself. With its reasonable price and remarkable results, it's truly worth every penny.

**Price:** $29.95  
**Store:** Emjoi  
[Buy Now](https://www.example.com/product-page/B01F6BEV2A)

*Note: The Emjoi Micro-Pedi Tornado requires an electric power source and comes in a compact size of 6 x 2.5 x 1 inches. It weighs only 12.8 ounces. The package includes 2 regular blue rollers (one preinstalled on the unit), 3 precision cone rollers, and 1 extra gentle roller.*

Details: {"Color": "Yellow", "Material": "Nylon", "Item Form": "wraps", "Brand": "AJOY", "Item Dimensions LxWxH": "3.9 x 3.4 x 3.4 inches", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "3.9 x 3.4 x 3.4 inches; 1.1 Ounces", "UPC": "714449936058", "Manufacturer": "AJOY LLC"}
Review Text: Easy to make buns, for thick OR thin hair Perfect for first responder moms and the littles are perfect for little ballerinas! Mom loves it These are perfect for doing ballerina dance buns for my toddler! did not work for me. Worked really well for ballet recitals. They take a bit of practice but make a nice bun. Works just like they are supposed to. Works well This is a great product for securing and adding volume to an updo. These spongy donuts can be twisted, wound and pinned any way you please. I don't care for "donut buns", but I do take these little donut sponges and wind them up into a perfect, immovable, retro bouffant.  My favorite thing about these little donuts is that they are easily penetrated with bobby pins for the sturdiest, easiest updo ever. So much better than the bumpits, pads, scarves  and assorted inserts I wrestled with before finding these. I also like that you get more than one becuase this allows for experimentation- I took one of the donuts and cut it so that it is now one long spongy tube that I use to make the bouffant and beautifully giant French Twist (think Cate Blanchett in The House With a Clock in its Walls). So if you  want your hairdo large and sturdy this is a great choice. Five stars. Fast and easy hair do for my seven year old daughter in the mornings. She loves trying new things with her hair and there are tons of ways to use these magic hair donuts!

## Waterpik Ultra Water Flosser Combo, Black

The Waterpik Ultra Water Flosser Combo, Black, is our most popular water flosser that provides a convenient and effective way to improve your oral health. With its powerful water pressure, this water flosser removes debris and plaque from between your teeth and below the gumline, leaving you with a cleaner and healthier mouth.

### Features:

- **90 seconds of water capacity:** With a large water reservoir, you can thoroughly clean your entire mouth without the need for constant refilling.
- **Ten pressure settings:** Customize your flossing experience with ten different pressure settings, allowing you to find the perfect level of comfort and effectiveness.
- **3-year warranty on Ultra:** We stand behind the quality of our product with a 3-year warranty on the Ultra water flosser, giving you peace of mind.
- **Tip rotates 360 degrees on cordless:** The cordless water flosser is designed with a rotating tip, providing easy access to all areas of your mouth for a thorough clean.

### Dual Combo Pack with 12 Tips:

This brand new in box combo pack includes everything you need for your oral care routine. It comes with 12 tips, 1 Ultra water flosser, 1 cordless plus water flosser, and 2 deluxe travel cases. The cordless water flosser is also dual voltage, making it perfect for travel.

### Customer Reviews:

Here's what customers are saying about the Waterpik Ultra Water Flosser Combo:

- "**Great oral item:** This flosser is pretty powerful, and the portable one is convenient for travel. I can really tell the difference between using this and traditional flossing. Highly recommend!"
- "**Love this product:** I'm so glad I purchased this water flosser. I definitely feel the difference with my teeth. It's especially beneficial for me as I have braces and it helps keep my gums healthy."
- "**Works perfectly:** I received this as a gift to replace my old Waterpik flosser, and it works perfectly. It comes with many new head pieces, making it versatile for different needs."
- "**Convenient and effective:** This Waterpik combo pack is the best oral care product you will ever buy. It's small and powerful, making it great for both home use and travel."

### Experience the Difference:

Upgrade your oral care routine with the Waterpik Ultra Water Flosser Combo. With its advanced features, convenient design, and positive customer reviews, this water flosser is the perfect addition to your daily routine. Don't miss out on the opportunity to improve your oral health!

The gel consistency of this eyeliner ensures effortless application, allowing you to achieve precise lines with ease. Once dry, the color sets in place, giving you a bold and captivating look that lasts all day long.

### Perfect for All Ages and Skin Types
Whether you're a makeup beginner or a seasoned expert, this gel eyeliner is suitable for everyone. Its versatile formula works well for all skin types and ages, ensuring that anyone can enjoy the benefits of this exceptional product.

Are loose eyelids making it difficult for you to achieve that perfect eyeliner look? Look no further. The Beauty Creations Gel Eyeliner's applicator is designed specifically to address this concern. With its precision tip, you can effortlessly apply the liner to your upper lids, giving you stunning results.

### Stay Put, No Matter What
Say goodbye to smudged and smudged liner. This gel eyeliner is not only water-resistant but also stays put on your waterline - both upper and lower. No more worrying about your eyeliner budging throughout the day. With this eyeliner, you can stay confident and look your best from morning till night.

Customers have raved about the Beauty Creations Gel Eyeliner Black. One customer expressed delight over its pigmentation and ease of application, especially on looser eyelids.
