Experience the legacy of close shaves with the Gillette Mach 3-16 Count (2 x 8 Pack). ## Features:

- **Gillette 3-Blade Technology:** The Gillette Mach3 features three high-quality blades that provide a close and comfortable shave.
- **Comfort Guard:** Equipped with five microfins, the comfort guard ensures a close shave without any irritation or discomfort.
- **Indicator Lubrication Strip:** The lubrication strip fades to white when it's time to replace the blade, ensuring you get the optimal shave every time.

## Benefits:

- **A Close and Comfortable Shave:** The Gillette Mach 3-16 Count (2 x 8 Pack) delivers a close shave, thanks to its 3-Blade technology. Say goodbye to nicks and cuts and hello to a smooth and comfortable shaving experience.
- **Long-lasting Performance:** These blades are known for their longevity. Each blade lasts for multiple shaves, providing excellent value for your money.
- **Convenient Exchangeable Blades:** The Gillette Mach3 blades are easy to replace, allowing you to maintain a consistently high-quality shave, every time.

## Customer Review:

*This blade is truly amazing. It follows my face very well and the blades really clean the whisker off very close to the skin. I have not had any nicks and the blade is lasting for many many shaves. Get the Gillette Mach 3-16 Count (2 x 8 Pack) from Gillette today and enjoy the convenience and comfort of a close shave that lasts. Add this trusted choice to your daily routine and start each day with confidence.

# Grandma's Pure & Natural Poison Ivy Bar & Don't Bug Me Bar

### Repel Insects and Relieve Itching Naturally

Grandma's Pure & Natural Poison Ivy Bar & Don't Bug Me Bar is the perfect solution to keep those pesky mosquitoes away and alleviate the itch of poison ivy. With an average rating of 4.2 from 37 satisfied customers, this soap bar is a must-have for anyone looking for a natural and effective repellent.

## Features:

- Pure & natural
- Helps relieve the itch of poison ivy and repels insects
- Apply liberally, scrub as best you can, and let sit on the skin for a few minutes for best results

## Repel Mosquitoes Without Harsh Chemicals

Thanks to Grandma's soap bar, you can effectively repel mosquitoes without the use of DEET or other chemicals. It's safe for kids and has a pleasant smell that won't stain clothing. Say goodbye to those itchy mosquito bites and enjoy outdoor activities without any worries.

## Relieve Poison Ivy Itch

Grandma's Poison Ivy And Oak Bar is your go-to solution for treating and relieving the itch of poison ivy, oak, and sumac. With the power of Jewelweed, a rare plant used for centuries as a natural preventative and treatment, this soap bar works almost immediately to stop the itching and clears up the rash in just 2 to 3 days.

## Experience Natural Relief

Experience the benefits of natural ingredients with Grandma's Pure & Natural Poison Ivy Bar & Don't Bug Me Bar. It contains natural Impatiens Capensis, an excellent substitute for corticosteroids, making it suitable for sensitive skin. This 2.15 oz bar is easy to use and provides long-lasting relief.

## Trusted and Recommended

Customers have praised Grandma's soap bar for its excellent action against poison ivy and oak. One customer mentions, "This worked in clearing up my husband and grandson's itchy poison ivy." Another customer appreciates the soap's effectiveness, but points out that the bug soap has a strong smell.

## Order Your Grandma's Soap Bar Today

Don't let mosquitoes ruin your outdoor fun, and don't suffer from the itch of poison ivy. Get Grandma's Pure & Natural Poison Ivy Bar & Don't Bug Me Bar today and experience the natural relief you deserve. Click the "Add to Cart" button now and enjoy the benefits of Grandma's trusted and recommended soap bar.

Price: $19.99
Store: Grandma's Soap

# Almay Clear Complexion Pressed Powder: Flawless, Shine-Free Skin

**Price**: $8.01

**Brand**: Almay

**Skin Type**: Oily

---

### Keep Your Skin Looking Flawless and Shine-Free

With Almay Clear Complexion Pressed Powder, say goodbye to oily skin and hello to a flawless, shine-free complexion. This finely-milled face powder is designed to absorb excess oil without the risk of caking or drying out your skin. 

### Clear and Prevent Blemishes with Salicylic Acid

Formulated with a powerful dose of acne-fighting salicylic acid, this pressed powder helps shrink blemishes and prevent new ones from appearing - giving you clearer, healthier-looking skin. 

### Seamless Shades for Sheer-to-Light Coverage

Choose from the six available seamless shades to achieve a sheer-to-light coverage with a natural finish. No matter your skin tone, this pressed powder will effortlessly blend in, leaving your complexion looking flawless. 

### Infused with Meadowsweet for Purified Skin

Almay Clear Complexion Pressed Powder is also infused with meadowsweet, known for its purifying properties. This natural ingredient helps keep your skin clear and refreshed throughout the day. 

### Dermatologist Tested and Hypoallergenic

As always, Almay Clear Complexion Pressed Powder is dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, fragrance-free, clean, and cruelty-free. You can trust that this powder is gentle on your skin and suitable for all skin types. 

---

**What Customers Are Saying**

- "Great for those with sensitive skin!"
- "Good-quality powder that never cakes or gets streaky."
- "My skin just looks so much better."
- "Blends into my skin, but doesn’t cause breakouts."
- "The best Pressed Powder ever!"

---

Transform your daily makeup routine with Almay Clear Complexion Pressed Powder. Experience the benefits of a shine-free, flawless complexion and clearer, healthier-looking skin. Click "Add to Cart" now and enjoy the confidence that comes with great-looking skin.

For a complete and most up-to-date list of ingredients, please refer to the product's packaging.", 'How To Use', '🔻 Exfoliate and moisturize lips 15-20 minutes prior to application. 🔻 Wipe off excess moisture on lips. 🔻 Apply a thin clean coat and let dry completely before rubbing lips together.', "What's In The Package", '🎁 1x LA Splash Cosmetics Soft Liquid Matte Lipstick - LIP COUTURE, Color: Poison Apple.'] Price: 14.0 Store: LA Splash Details: {"Brand": "LA Splash", "Color": "Poison Apple", "Skin Type": "All", "Item Form": "Liquid", "Finish Type": "Matte", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.29 x 0.79 x 0.79 inches; 0.63 Ounces", "UPC": "818947021480", "Manufacturer": "Jon Davler, Inc."} Review Text: I've tried a lot of matte lipsticks and this one is the BEST. The Latte Confession color is a bit darker and redder (I was hoping for a clay / pink) but it is an amazing product. Stay power is wonderful even with drinking and eating. I only need to reapply once after the initial application. Pigmentation is strong also. You truly get a great product for the value. I purchased rose garden (the color is a bit brighter and neon pinker than I wanted) and just ordered innocent vixen too. This is HUGE because I can never buy more than one of a lipstick because I don't truly love it. Just a small note: it is a matte lipstick so it does dry my lips out a little. I moisturize at night and I'm good to go. It's also very easy to take off at the end of the day (no scrubbing or rubbing). I like it, but even if you apply a small amount your teeth will be brown la Splash lipsticks are great. Found out about them on YouTube Like the company, I personally did not like the shade. Too bright pink for a middle-aged​ lady. I love the formula of these. They are comfortable and long-wearing, which is a rarity in liquid mattes. The smell is pretty horrid (like paint) but goes away once it dries. This particular color (latte) is a very grey-toned, pale nude which is unfortunately unflattering on me in natural light. I am very fair-skinned with pink undertones and my boyfriend legitimately thought I was having breathing problems because my lips looked blue. Even though this shade didn't work for me I would absolutely try others in this line. This lipstick in Retro Bettie is a MUST HAVE for my beauty regimen as a jazz singer. I have to put my face on about an hour before I get to a gig, which is an hour before it starts, and it lasts 3 hours: so I need a lipstick that can last a minimum of 5 hours. THIS IS THAT LIPSTICK!

It goes on smooth, and the tip is like a typical lip gloss applicator. But it is not forgiving (it will temporarily stain your regular skin if you're not careful!), it is forever. Once you put it on just hang out with your mouth open for 30 seconds for it to seal in, and then you're good to go, with drinks and everything, for at least my usual 5-hour stint.

At the end of the day, this lipstick does smudge off, or even wash off: it flakes off. Which is kind of amazing since I don't use makeup remover: I just rub my lips against each other, or rub them with a paper towel or washclothes and the whole thing comes off easily.

NOTE: Your lips will feel dry by the end of the night because they will be, but you CANNOT add a lip gloss or chapstick atop this lipstick or it will completely lose its efficacy as a stay-put product: it will move around and stain everything—I learned this the hard way.

Almost every pic on my Instagram (@ojanmarie) has me wearing this excellent shade, which is a true red, on the slightly blue-red side, but not bright like a tomato, much deeper and more saturated than that. It will go on your lips a lighter shade and will dry darker, just FYI.

Good luck using my fav product!!! I love it, although it does smear if it gets wet. This is a great product, works as advertised, and the color is wonderful. It stays on really well. I am very happy about that. It is a little dull though and makes your lips look a little dry. Other than that it was pretty good I love LA Splash lipsticks. They last and you only need one swipe of the wand to get full coverage color. They can feel very dry on the lips, but I don't mind that.

For a complete and most up-to-date list of ingredients, please refer to the product's packaging.", 'How To Use', '🔻 Exfoliate and moisturize lips 15-20 minutes prior to application. 🔻 Wipe off excess moisture on lips. 🔻 Apply a thin clean coat and let dry completely before rubbing lips together.', "What's In The Package", '🎁 1x LA Splash Cosmetics Soft Liquid Matte Lipstick - LIP COUTURE, Color: Poison Apple.'] Price: 14.0 Store: LA Splash Details: {"Brand": "LA Splash", "Color": "Poison Apple", "Skin Type": "All", "Item Form": "Liquid", "Finish Type": "Matte", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.29 x 0.79 x 0.79 inches; 0.63 Ounces", "UPC": "818947021480", "Manufacturer": "Jon Davler, Inc."} Review Text: I've tried a lot of matte lipsticks and this one is the BEST. The Latte Confession color is a bit darker and redder (I was hoping for a clay / pink) but it is an amazing product. Stay power is wonderful even with drinking and eating. I only need to reapply once after the initial application. Pigmentation is strong also. You truly get a great product for the value. I purchased rose garden (the color is a bit brighter and neon pinker than I wanted) and just ordered innocent vixen too. This is HUGE because I can never buy more than one of a lipstick because I don't truly love it. Just a small note: it is a matte lipstick so it does dry my lips out a little. I moisturize at night and I'm good to go. It's also very easy to take off at the end of the day (no scrubbing or rubbing). I like it, but even if you apply a small amount your teeth will be brown la Splash lipsticks are great. Found out about them on YouTube Like the company, I personally did not like the shade. Too bright pink for a middle-aged​ lady. I love the formula of these. They are comfortable and long-wearing, which is a rarity in liquid mattes. The smell is pretty horrid (like paint) but goes away once it dries. This particular color (latte) is a very grey-toned, pale nude which is unfortunately unflattering on me in natural light. I am very fair-skinned with pink undertones and my boyfriend legitimately thought I was having breathing problems because my lips looked blue. Even though this shade didn't work for me I would absolutely try others in this line. This lipstick in Retro Bettie is a MUST HAVE for my beauty regimen as a jazz singer. I have to put my face on about an hour before I get to a gig, which is an hour before it starts, and it lasts 3 hours: so I need a lipstick that can last a minimum of 5 hours. THIS IS THAT LIPSTICK!

It goes on smooth, and the tip is like a typical lip gloss applicator. But it is not forgiving (it will temporarily stain your regular skin if you're not careful!), it is forever. Once you put it on just hang out with your mouth open for 30 seconds for it to seal in, and then you're good to go, with drinks and everything, for at least my usual 5-hour stint.

At the end of the day, this lipstick does smudge off, or even wash off: it flakes off. Which is kind of amazing since I don't use makeup remover: I just rub my lips against each other, or rub them with a paper towel or washclothes and the whole thing comes off easily.

NOTE: Your lips will feel dry by the end of the night because they will be, but you CANNOT add a lip gloss or chapstick atop this lipstick or it will completely lose its efficacy as a stay-put product: it will move around and stain everything—I learned this the hard way.

Almost every pic on my Instagram (@ojanmarie) has me wearing this excellent shade, which is a true red, on the slightly blue-red side, but not bright like a tomato, much deeper and more saturated than that. It will go on your lips a lighter shade and will dry darker, just FYI.

Good luck using my fav product!!! I love it, although it does smear if it gets wet. This is a great product, works as advertised, and the color is wonderful. It stays on really well. I am very happy about that. It is a little dull though and makes your lips look a little dry. Other than that it was pretty good I love LA Splash lipsticks. They last and you only need one swipe of the wand to get full coverage color. They can feel very dry on the lips, but I don't mind that. '}]

# Body Fantasies Signature Vanilla Body Spray: A Delightful Blend of Fragrances

Introducing Body Fantasies Signature Vanilla by Parfums de Coeur, a treat for your senses. This Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance is designed for women who appreciate a delightful blend of vanilla, jasmine, apple, and musk. With its captivating aroma, this body spray offers a touch of luxury at an affordable price.

## A Scent That Leaves a Lasting Impression

With an average rating of 4.7 from 592 customers, Body Fantasies Signature Vanilla has been a favorite for many. This lightweight 8 oz body spray is perfect for daily use, making it ideal for shopping trips, social outings, or just casual visits. A little goes a long way, ensuring value for money.

## Unleash Your Signature Smell

The pleasing fragrance of vanilla from Body Fantasies has garnered countless compliments, making it a signature scent for many loyal customers. Its long-lasting aroma can be enjoyed whether sprayed on wet or dry hair, leaving you smelling lovely all day long. Fondly remembered by a bff's kid as the smell of flowers, this body spray has the power to create lasting memories.

## Versatile and Convenient

Not only does Body Fantasies Signature Vanilla smell amazing, but it also doubles as an odor-covering agent. It works wonders in eliminating cooking odors, ensuring your home remains fresh and inviting. Additionally, this body spray is gentle on fabrics and won't stain clothing.

## Wake Up to a Fragrant Haven

Enhance your bedtime routine by incorporating Body Fantasies Signature Vanilla into your evening ritual. Use it as a body spray after your shower, and for an added layer of indulgence, lightly spritz it on your mattress and pillows before slipping into clean sheets. Allow the delightful scent of vanilla to accompany you as you drift off into a peaceful slumber.

Seize the opportunity to add a touch of luxury to your day with the Body Fantasies Signature Vanilla Body Spray. Place your order today and experience the enchanting allure of this fragrant treasure.

*Price: $27.99, Store: Parfums De Coeur*

Product ID: B075RKHZ6T Title: Mofajang Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud, Natural Hairstyle Color Pomade, Washable Temporary (White) Average Rating: 3.5 Number of Ratings: 291 Features: ['✓This product helps style your hair, while providing temporary and fantastic hair dye color and coverage', '✓Great product for those who like to change hair colors without damaging your hair - there are 7 colors to choose from and the product washes out easily. No stickiness!!', '✓Made of natural ingredients, no scalp irritation, environmentally friendly and no harm to your health', '✓Professional hair wax matte for men and women, gives all hair types the hold, control, and shine that it needs', '✓LIFETIME WARRANTY- Love them or we’ll buy them back from you, no questions asked!'] Description: ["Whether you're going to a fun party or cosplay at your next convention, this product is a fun and great way to test our various hair colors. Not only does it provide temporary color, but it also acts as a great way to style and mold your hair in desired shape. The formula is not sticky at all and washes out easily. Time to shine and stand out!! HOW TO USE ✓How to use First clean your hair and dry well. ✓Take a good amount of wax from the bottle onto the palm of your hand. Use your fingers to apply product at the scalp, pulling hairs together. Repeat several times in order to style to desired effect. ✓Apply to a section of hair for highlights or apply the wax on the entire head ✓Washes out easily with just warm water. ✓Awesome temporary hair color and wax, holds hair in place. Very easy and fun to use. A keeper in your hair product collection. Perect for everyday, concerts, parties, events, clubbing, cosplay, raves, and Halloween!"] Price: 7.48 Store: MOFAJANG Details: {"Package Information": "Jar", "Brand": "MOFAJANG", "Item Form": "Wax", "Hair Type": "All", "Unit Count": "4.23 Fl Oz", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "4.4 x 3 x 2 inches; 5.61 Ounces", "UPC": "732140593653", "Manufacturer": "Mofajang hair color"} Review Text: Doesn't smell bad. I bought white and it didn't cover up my dark brown beard very well. Works nicely. Thank you Works as advertised, but you need a lot to make your hair as white as the images they are showing as examples.

I have short black hair, so take that into consideration, as black is difficult to get a full white coverup.
But when styling my hair with regular wax, I use about 1/4 to 1/3 teaspoon for styling.

To get white coverage with this wax, I need to use 3-5 times that much of this product.

Also - it's cool to know that it's actually just zinc oxide they use for the white coloring - safe sunscreen mineral. The white product turns dark hair a shiny grey color, which is exactly what I was looking for. If you are looking to go grey and you have dark brown or black hair, I would recommend you try the white. This probably would not work on long hair. It looked awesome on the top of my hair (sides of my head are shaved with about 3 inches of hair on top). Great look for new year's parties, costume parties or just a week's worth of temporary hair changes. I would not use it long term but it's a fun short term product. It will get glitter on your pillow if you try and sleep with it in. Goes on wet; you have to use a large amount. It will dry and then you will be able to touch it, but otherwise it will get all over your hands and forehead. The good news is it's very easy to remove with one rinse of just water, both from skin and hair. Makes your hair very stiff and somewhat difficult to style, but I made it work by slicking it back with a comb. Not exactly like the viral videos, but I got lots of compliments and had fun!

This is just my experience with the product, please let me know if my review helped by clicking below! Love it. I have black hair with a few silver hairs at the temples, so I bought this to accentuate it. I'd planned to put s few more permanent silver streaks in my hair, but I'm happy that I bought this instead: it washes out easily if I don't quite get the effect I want. I was able to put in very natural silver streaks. The effect is subtle on darker hair, but it beautifully enhanced my gray temples.
The product arrived well ahead of time & was well packaged. It smells nice, and it easily washes out.
One caveat: it is water soluble. If you live in a hot or humid place, or you perspire easily, it could run a bit if your hair gets wet.
I'd definitely buy it again. I'm curious about the other colors. This product is SOLID. I got to try out what my hair would look like in the gray-ish color before actually dyeing it.

I've wanted this color for so long, but I have a tan/beige skin complexion which a lot of lighter colors don't suit, so I was apprehensive about doing it. I got to use this product to try it out and get some opinions and now that I know that I loved it and everyone else loved it, I can dye my hair without fear. That means this product was MORE than worth it.

Also when applying the cream, initially it makes my hair feel a bit stiff, as would any leave-in creme based products so that's not unreasonable to expect. But after a few minutes the stiff feeling was gone and my hair returned to its natural form and shape, which really allowed me to gauge how I looked with this colored hair.

Overall this is a solid 5/5 experience and I couldn't be happier.

My hair type is long thick black hair of asian origin. I know some people have been wondering if it works on <x> type of hair, so I thought i would include that information. Did not come close to working in my long dirty blonde hair. Maybe if you have dark shirt hair it would be better? Does not work at all Absolutely Horrendous. (-: This is by far the worst item I have ever purchased on amazon. I was under the impression that it would make my hair look white and be easy to work with, like the photos. oh no, no no no no. it was sticky, stuck into my hair like hair gel, looked wet/greasy, and was impossible to brush in. first I did a little bit at a time with no luck, and then a lot of it. Seriously felt like i just squirted elmer's glue into my hair. it is by the far the worst product I've ever put in my hair. even after 3 washes/conditions my hair is frizzy and I have a zillion split ends. really upset!
Pics - after & before!

# MOFAJANG Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud: Temporary Color and Perfect Style

Looking to add a pop of color and style to your hair? The MOFAJANG Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud is the perfect solution! Whether you're heading to a fun party, a cosplay event, or simply want to try out different hair colors, this product is your go-to choice. 

## Temporary Color and Styling Power

The MOFAJANG Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud not only provides temporary color, but also acts as a great way to style and mold your hair into any desired shape. With 7 vibrant colors to choose from, you can experiment and change your hair color without damaging your natural hair. Plus, the product washes out easily, leaving no stickiness behind. 

## Natural and Healthy Formula

Crafted with natural ingredients, this hair wax dye is gentle on your scalp and doesn't cause any irritation. It's environmentally friendly, making it safe for both you and the planet. 

## Hold, Control, and Shine

Designed for both men and women, this professional hair wax matte gives all hair types the hold, control, and shine they need. Style your hair with confidence, knowing that it will stay in place throughout the day.

## LIFETIME WARRANTY and Customer Satisfaction

We believe in the quality of our product, which is why we offer a LIFETIME WARRANTY. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, we'll buy it back from you, no questions asked. 

Make your hair shine and stand out with the MOFAJANG Hair Wax Dye Styling Cream Mud. Get yours today and experience the convenience of temporary hair color and perfect style!

*Price: $7.48 - Store: MOFAJANG*

# KIKO MILANO - Glow Fusion Powder Highlighter

Introducing the KIKO MILANO Glow Fusion Powder Highlighter - a must-have addition to your makeup collection. This buildable effect powder highlighter offers a new sensory texture that is creamy and easy to blend, giving you a flawless finish with a soft focus effect.

## Creamy and Easy to Blend

The innovative formula of this highlighter makeup creates a velvety touch on your face. With a blend of softening ingredients, it leaves a long-lasting feeling of comfort. On contact with your skin, it gives a flawless finish, ensuring a radiant and glowing complexion throughout the day.

## Optimum Color Release with Buildable Effect

With a high concentration of pearls, this highlighter helps create points of light, guaranteeing optimum color release. Whether you prefer a soft contouring or a more pronounced effect, this product delivers buildable coverage for every type of makeup. Choose from three different shades suitable for all complexions.

## Hypoallergenic and Highest Quality

Rest assured, KIKO make up lines undergo thorough clinical testing to produce hypoallergenic products formulated to minimize allergy risks. The Glow Fusion Powder Highlighter is non-comedogenic and of the highest quality, ensuring safety and satisfaction for your skin.

## Customer Reviews

- "Love it! This highlighter goes on smoothly and stays for hours. I use it for my cheeks and highlighting areas of my face. It gives me a healthy glow. I will purchase it again."
- "Me encanto es un brillo muy natural." (Translation: "I loved it, it's a very natural shine.")
- "I’ve never used this brand and am happily surprised. Beautiful color with a soft velvet-like touch to it. This goes on smoothly and stays for hours. I use it for my cheeks and highlighting areas of my face. Healthy glow. I will purchase again."

Take your makeup game to the next level with the KIKO MILANO Glow Fusion Powder Highlighter. Shop now and unleash your natural radiance!

It looks just like my natural skin when applied. I purchased my Aeroblend system in November, and it's Wonderful! Since November, I have tried Luminess, Belloccio, and Aeroblend foundations. I had hoped I would like Belloccio because it's half the price, but it could not compare to the Aeroblend Foundation. The Luminess was too sticky, like it never set. The Aeroblend looks Absolutely Flawless. It takes minutes to do my makeup now, and so many people have asked me about my skin. I am so glad I purchased my Aeroblend system! I ordered this for my 16 year old granddaughter and she LOVES it. She said her makeup is sooooo awesome with this that she hates to take it off. She had a luminess airbrush and it was difficult to clean and would put dots of makeup on her face instead of a nice smooth finish. This one is amazing. Large bottle. Great color match. Secure bottle. I'm 100% happy!
After reading the reviews I was excited to try this. WoW! I purchased the Luminous kit previously & at first was excited but the bottles were small and they always leaked (in shipping & in my cabinet). This color was a perfect match for my light (not pale) skin. I use with my Luminous air system and LOVE it! This will be my go to! I was use to the small bottle, and I managed to spill the liquid twice.........if your used to the small bottles do something that you don't make the same mistake I did twice. And so much bigger than the original sample bottles I had with my machine I purchased this system and the first container was great. This one is full of lumps and will not blend. Even after shaking for almost 10 minutes. It plugged up the tip and now I am unable to use the foundation. Seriously disappointed. This is the lightest, most long-wearing foundation I've ever used. Period. And with mature (52) skin which tends to be dry, I'm not left with unsightly creases at the end of the day either. I use the Aeroblend airbrush to apply this in the morning and it looks great literally all day long! Despite having sensitive skin, this makeup has not caused a single breakout to date. It also doesn't feel like I'm wearing a mask - goes on light and stays that way. Highly recommend. I have never ordered this brand so I thought i’d Get it a try especially for the price of the size bottle you get. I ordered two different colors since I wasn’t sure and this one N20 was a perfect match for my skin. You also use less of this than the Luminess I have always purchased. This is what I will use from now on. Great makeup but thinner than I’m used to so I had to adjust, will buy again, better price. I like to buy a very light and very dark in airbrush makeup so I can mix any shade in between. The problem with this product is it cant be back bubbled. It just created a bunch of bubbles. To mix it you have to mix in a separate container and then pour it into the airbrush. Sadly I bought a bunch of light when it was on sale around Christmas so Im stuck with it for now. Another big issue with this brand that I havent experienced with any other airbrush makeup is that it settles really bad and you have to shake it vigorously for quite a while before it mixes. I have never had a product that required this much shaking. The color is decent but tends to rub off easily. I have to be extra careful not to touch my face.

response:
# Aeroblend Airbrush Makeup Foundation (O35)

Achieve a flawless and natural-looking complexion with the Aeroblend Airbrush Makeup Foundation. This water-based foundation is designed for use with the Aeroblend airbrush systems, providing you with long-lasting and waterproof coverage that doesn't require frequent touch-ups. 

## Key Features

- **Long Lasting Effect**: You can confidently wear Aeroblend makeup foundation for up to 10 hours. It is sweatproof and even sweat can't wipe it away, making it perfect for high-definition occasions.

- **Safe and Hypoallergenic**: This foundation is paraben and silicone-free, keeping your skin safe from harmful chemicals. It is also fragrance-free, making it ideal for individuals with sensitive skin.

- **Suitable for All Skin Types**: From dry to oily, this foundation is formulated to cater to all skin types, providing a natural and flawless finish.

- **Natural Ingredients**: Enriched with botanical and mineral ingredients like kaolin, lavender, and jojoba, this foundation hydrates and soothes your skin while providing the coverage you desire. The soft-focus pigments give you a perfect finish, even in high-definition situations.

## Customer Reviews

*"Aeroblend is the best airbrush foundation. It looks just like my natural skin when applied."* - *Verified Purchase*

*"I ordered this for my 16-year-old granddaughter and she LOVES it. She said her makeup is sooooo awesome with this that she hates to take it off."* - *Verified Purchase*

*"This is the lightest, most long-wearing foundation I've ever used. It goes on light and stays that way. Highly recommend."* - *Verified Purchase*

## Get Your Perfect Match

With a wide range of color selection, Aeroblend ensures that you'll find the perfect match for your skin tone. This foundation is available in the shade O35.

## 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed

Experience the flawless and long-lasting coverage of Aeroblend Airbrush Makeup Foundation. Say goodbye to touch-ups and hello to a natural-looking complexion. Click "Add to Cart" now and discover the difference!

## Lobe Wonder Invisible Earring Earlobe Support Patches (Pack of 2)

**Price: $11.99**  
**Store: Lobe Wonder**

### Description

Lobe Wonder Ear Lobe Support Patches are the perfect solution for torn, damaged, and stretched ear lobes caused by heavy pierced earrings. These invisible patches provide instant repair and support, allowing you to wear your favorite earrings with confidence. Each self-adhesive oval patch is super-reinforced with a criss-cross network, strengthening and supporting your ear lobes. Say goodbye to stretched and dragged down ear lobes!

### Criss-Cross Network for Reinforcement

Worn discreetly behind your ear lobes, the Lobe Wonder patches use a unique criss-cross network that strengthens and supports your ear lobes. This innovative design ensures that your ear lobes look natural and not stretched or sagging due to the weight of heavy earrings. 

### Breathable and Skin-friendly

Lobe Wonder patches are "breathable" and made with a special medical adhesive that is gentle on the skin. You'll experience no irritation or discomfort while wearing these patches. 

### Versatile and Convenient

With Lobe Wonder, you can wear your chandelier earrings, hoops, and favorite studs without worry about tearing or stretching. These patches are durable, long-lasting, and reliable, providing excellent support for your ear lobes. 

### Customer Reviews

*"I haven't been able to find the brand in stores since Claire's shut down. Lobe Wonder patches are durable, long-lasting, and reliable." - 5 stars*  
*"I have bought these for years. They are an excellent value at Amazon and work great. I LOVE THESE!!!!" - 5 stars*  
*"I could never wear stud earrings or small earrings until I discovered these about 6 years ago. They worked exactly as they are supposed to!" - 5 stars*

Try Lobe Wonder Invisible Earring Earlobe Support Patches today and experience the freedom to wear your favorite earrings without worrying about stretched ear lobes. Add to your cart now and enjoy the benefits of strong, natural-looking ear lobes!

response:
## Becca Be A Light Palette: Illuminate Your Natural Beauty

### Introducing the Becca Be A Light Palette (Medium to Deep)

The Becca Be A Light Palette is your secret to achieving a naturally flawless complexion. With its innovative Sheer Glow Filter Powder, this all-over face palette is designed to let your natural skin shine through. Get ready to experience a soft and radiant finish that enhances your unique beauty.

#### A Perfecting Veil for a Soft, Natural Finish

Featuring varying levels of pigment and pearl, the Becca Sheer Glow Filter Powder acts as a real-life filter for your skin. Thanks to its Light Diffusing Technology, this silky and lightweight formula visibly minimizes imperfections while evening out your skin tone. Say goodbye to the visible signs of pores, lines, and blemishes, and hello to a perfecting veil that enhances your natural beauty.

#### Four Stunning Shades to Illuminate and Define

The Medium to Deep shade palette includes four exquisite shades that work harmoniously to brighten, blur, contour, and add a luminous flush to your complexion. 

1. Brighten - A neutral peach shade that highlights your complexion, giving you a natural, lit-from-within glow.
  
2. Blur - A warm sand hue that effortlessly minimizes the look of pores, lines, and blemishes, leaving you with a smooth and flawless canvas.

3. Contour - Create natural dimension with the warm bronze shade that brings depth and definition to your facial features.

4. Blush - Add a touch of warmth and radiance with the warm copper shade infused with rose gold pearl, giving you a luminous flush that looks stunning on any skin tone.

#### Unleash Your Inner Glow

The Becca Be A Light Palette is more than just makeup—it's a game-changer. With its blendable and buildable formula, you have full control to create your desired look, from a subtle daytime glow to a show-stopping evening radiance. 

#### Customer Reviews Love the Becca Be A Light Palette

Don't just take our word for it. Here's what some of our customers have to say about the Becca Be A Light Palette:

*"This is my favorite daily palette. Works well with no other concealer, powder - allows for natural contouring. I’m normally 050 in Dior or MAC C7, Bobbi Brown 6.5 Almond, and these colors in this palette are great."*

*"Beautiful colors that can be used for a gorgeous contour. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! BECCA, I LOVE YOU, THIS LITERALLY IS GOLD. This palette is sooo great!!! I love it!!!"*

Join countless others who have discovered the magic of the Becca Be A Light Palette. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your natural beauty and achieve a flawless complexion.

[Dazzle with the Becca Be A Light Palette now](link-to-purchase) and let your true beauty shine through!

**Price:** $78.49  
**Store:** BECCA

Product ID: B07HXWG5SP Title: Paco Rabanne 1 ONE MILLION EDT 100ml 3.4oz Eau de Toilette Men NEW SEALED BOX Average Rating: 4.7 Number of Ratings: 3663 Features: [] Description: ['Paco Rabanne 1 ONE MILLION EDT 100ml 3.4oz Eau de Toilette Men NEW SEALED BOX'] Price: 63.49 Store: Paco Rabanne Details: {"Brand": "Paco Rabanne", "Item Form": "Spray", "Item Volume": "3.4 Fluid Ounces", "Fragrance Concentration": "Eau_de_toilette", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "6.4 x 2.9 x 2 inches; 1.92 Ounces", "Item model number": "LE", "Manufacturer": "Paco Rabanne"} Review Text: The One Million LUCKY is my favorite scent on my husband. He ran out and I missed the smell, so I ordered more. However... One of these things is not like the other. Or rather, one of these things is like both...

The left bottle is a genuine bottle of One Million Lucky, the center bottle is what I just received, and the right bottle is One Million.

The bottle I just received.... Notice the one on the left has the chrome/gold front and clear glass? The one on the right has a gold front and amber glass? Hm. The one in the center has the chrome/gold front.... But amber glass??? It also smells nothing like Lucky. It definitely smells more of the regular One Million.

I have reordered and only HOPE this is an isolated incident and I get the correct thing this next time.
-----
I rec'd the bottle I reordered today, and thankfully everything seems to be legit with it and I can resume sniffing my husband. Smells great.

I usually use 2 squirts, with Sauvage and Chanel. With Lucky I need 3 for the staying power.

I was worried about all the fakes online, but I took my bottle to Macys - 100% LIGIT.

3/4 hour projection then need to reapply, reason I gave 4 Stars but I totally love this fragrance! I bought this Cologne as a Christmas Gift for my Son; He chose the type of Cologne, but of course I wanted to get a good deal and not pay Department Store prices! I'm always worried about buying products like this online, but the Cologne seemed to be the real thing and he was very happy with it...so let's call it a good deal. Excellent perfume 100 percent authentic, fully recommended. we purchased the little one for traveling - and it is truly a great smelling mens cologne which we'd read about then ordered a tester on - then this purchase. Give it a try you won't be disappointed. Nice! smells good A lot of complaints Smells grest Great scent.

Review Text: Good Nice material but the top button was broken off when I got it. I really like the material, easy clean, easy wash & dry. Excellent for grooming my dogs, hair slides off the material & clothes are totally protected. It easily works for men or women & the sizing is as listed. If I had one negative, I would prefer Velcro closures rather than the snaps, which are a bit tough to open & close if you have arthritis in the thumbs or hands. I wear size 14, this wouldn't fit well enough to snap below the waist. The material is slick and not too heavy. Great fit, length and like that you can roll the sleeves and secure them. Only downfall it shows every drop of anything that gets on it. I guess it would be perfect if was black Wish is bigger size I do fit in this one but people @ Wk not The material is perfect but it's cut out with men's proportions, women need something more synched at the waist and loose on the hips...so since it was straight cut it held my hips very snug, pass. This smock is very comfortable and stylish. Keeps spray from soaking my clothes, but not completely waterproof. That would be too hot to work in. Smaller size or two than advertised, but does the job.

# Hairdresser Grooming Smock for Men and Women - Protect Your Clothes in Style!

Designed with the needs of dog groomers, hair stylists, nail technicians, estheticians, and massage therapists in mind, the Grey Hairdresser Grooming Smock from PERFEHAIR is a must-have addition to your grooming toolkit. With its smart features and comfortable design, this grooming smock will not only protect your clothes but also elevate your professional appearance.

## Stylish and Comfortable Design

Made from soft and lightweight nylon material, this smock provides ultimate comfort throughout your grooming sessions. The Water-repellent and Anti-static properties ensure that hair won’t stick to the fabric, making cleanup a breeze. The L size of this smock is carefully designed for a snug fit with Bust 55" and Hip 50", while the Total Length of 37" and Sleeve Length of 15.7" provide optimal coverage.

## Practical Features for Convenience

The front of the smock is equipped with 6 easy snap closures, allowing for quick and hassle-free wear and removal. The 3/4 Roll-up Sleeves with snap closure add versatility to the design. Two large front pockets provide ample space to store and organize your essential tools, ensuring they are within easy reach whenever you need them.

## Rated 4.2 out of 5 by 233 happy customers

Don't just take our word for it! The Grey Hairdresser Grooming Smock has received an average rating of 4.2 from our satisfied customers. Users rave about the comfortable fit, lightweight feel, and the smock's ability to repel hair and protect clothes from spills. One customer even mentioned that it works equally well for both men and women.

However, some users mentioned that the snap closures can be a bit tough to open and close for individuals with arthritis. We appreciate your feedback and will consider incorporating Velcro closures in future versions.

## The Perfect Addition to Your Grooming Routine

Whether you're a professional groomer or a passionate pet lover grooming your furry friend at home, the Grey Hairdresser Grooming Smock is here to keep you looking clean and stylish. So why wait? Protect your clothes and elevate your grooming game today!

**Price**: $14.88

**Store**: PERFEHAIR

*Note: Package dimensions: 11.75 x 9.5 x 0.25 inches; 7.2 Ounces. Unisex design. Manufactured by PERFEHAIR in China.*

Made from durable plastic materials, these beads are built to last. They are lightweight and won't easily break, ensuring that you can enjoy them for a long time. Despite their small size, they add a delightful sparkle to your hair, making your hairstyle stand out.

# Amope PediMask Kit- 20 Minute Foot Mask

Your feet go through so much every day and have never failed you, isn't it time you show them some love? Introducing the Amope PediMask Kit, the perfect addition to your foot care routine for healthy-looking feet after just one use.

## Rejuvenate and Soothe in Minutes

The Amope PediMask Kit includes three sock masks that work to rejuvenate and soothe your heels in just 20 minutes. With the goodness of moisturizers and Macadamia Oil, these foot masks provide long-lasting hydration to your feet, leaving them baby smooth and refreshed.

## Quick and Easy

Designed to stay in place, the foot masks ensure no mess and easy cleanup. Simply put on the sock mask, remove after 20 minutes, and massage in any remaining product. It's that simple!

## Unleash the Full Potential

For best results, try using the Amope PediMask Kit along with the Amope Electronic Foot File. Together, they will give you soft, smooth, and beautiful feet that you'll love showing off.

## Customer Reviews

- "Made my feet feel very soft." - **4.5 stars**
- "Love the way the foot wrap feels on my feet!!" - **4 stars**
- "This product is great. Not being able to get a pedi during this pandemic, this product is the next best thing to having beautiful feet!" - **5 stars**

Get the Amope PediMask Kit now and give your feet the care and pampering they deserve. With just 20 minutes, you'll experience the joy of baby smooth feet in the comfort of your own home.

Price: $12.0  
Store: Amope

# Callus Pro Cordless Rechargeable Handheld Pedicure Tool

Get rid of tough, hard foot calluses gently and effortlessly with the Callus Pro Cordless Rechargeable Handheld Pedicure Tool. This innovative electric foot file uses rotating sanding discs to effectively remove calluses and dead skin layers, leaving your feet soft and smooth. With an average rating of 4.5 stars from 20 customer reviews, it's a reliable and trusted tool for achieving salon-like results at home.

## Features and Benefits

### Powerful and Convenient

The Callus Pro comes with 1 electric foot file, 1 adapter power supply, and 3 coarse grit disposable sanding discs. Its cordless and rechargeable design allows you to use it anywhere without the hassle of cords getting in the way. The lightweight handheld exfoliator gives you complete control over angle, pressure, and speed for optimal results.

### Smooth and Soft Feet

With a pressure sensitive button that controls the sanding speed from 16,000-19,000 RPM, the Callus Pro effectively removes tough foot calluses, giving you soft and smooth skin. The disposable and replaceable sanding discs make it easy to switch them out, making it ideal for multiple people to use. 

### User-Friendly Design

The Callus Pro is designed to fit comfortably in any adult hand. Its small handle ensures a secure grip, allowing you to easily maneuver the tool to reach all areas of your feet. Additionally, the rechargeable battery allows for all-day use with just an overnight charge.

## Customer Reviews

"I first saw this in a beauty store in Bangkok and started looking for it in the US and found it here. I have had dry feet for years (psoriasis) and this is the quickest remedy to take care of that though you have to be quick and careful as it works fast. Simple and effective. Have had it for two years and use it every week, never a problem! Highly recommend."

"This product is very defective. I have 2 friends who also had to return the same product due to it not working/holding a charge...or working while plugged in with zip power. You pay over $100 for a product that doesn't work and they only give you a 30 Day Return! I only used it 3 times...and only use it about once a month...so, the return window was closed. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT - WASTING YOUR MONEY."

## Get Smooth Feet Today

Experience the convenience and efficiency of the Callus Pro Cordless Rechargeable Handheld Pedicure Tool. Say goodbye to rough callused and dead skin, and hello to soft, smooth feet. Click the "Add to Cart" button now and get ready to step into a world of improved foot care.

Introducing the J2 Honey Lip Gloss, the go-to solution for nourished and protected lips. Formulated with SPF 15, Aloe Vera, and Vitamin E, this glossy lip balm offers a combination of style, health, and convenience. 

## Nourishing and Hydrating
Infused with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this lip gloss provides all-day moisture, leaving your lips soft, smooth, and supple. Enjoy the nourishing benefits of these natural ingredients, keeping your lips healthy and hydrated, no matter the environment.

## Sun Protection
With SPF 15, this lip gloss not only enhances your natural beauty but also shields your lips from harmful UV rays. Keep your lips protected and maintain their youthful beauty, even under the sun.

## Long-Lasting and Non-Sticky
Say goodbye to traditional lip glosses that leave a sticky residue. The J2 Honey Lip Gloss offers a long-lasting formula that doesn't compromise on comfort. Flaunt your glossy lips without worrying about stickiness or uncomfortable texture.

## Easy Application
The J2 Honey Lip Gloss glides smoothly onto your lips, thanks to its glossy finish. Apply it effortlessly, either on its own for a natural look or over your favorite lipstick for added shine. Enjoy a flawless application every time.

## Customer Reviews
- "Love the smell and the way it looks! I also love that it has SPF."

Perfect. Said I was getting 3??? Only got 1?? This is the brand that I have and it doesn't leak like the others.  It is well insulated, and it stays cold for a long time.  It's also really cute! ## **Introducing the Bath Accessories Ice Bag, Pigs: A Luxurious Spa Experience at Home**

Pamper yourself with the luxurious Bath Accessories Ice Bag, featuring adorable pig designs. This high-quality ice bag is the perfect addition to your bath and spa routine, providing a refreshing and soothing experience. 

### **Stay Cool and Refreshed with Long-lasting Ice Therapy**

With its exceptional design and superb quality, the Bath Accessories Ice Bag gets the job done without any hassle. It is expertly insulated, ensuring that your ice stays cold for a long time, allowing you to indulge in a truly relaxing experience. 

### **Convenient and Leak-Proof Design**

Designed to perfection, this ice bag is well-insulated to prevent leaks and ensure maximum convenience. Say goodbye to messy ice bags that spoil your relaxing moments. The Bath Accessories Ice Bag is here to give you a hassle-free experience.

### **Adorable Pig Designs for a Touch of Fun**

Not only does the Bath Accessories Ice Bag provide exceptional functionality, but it also adds a delightful touch of whimsy to your bathing routine with its charming pig designs. It's an absolute delight for pig enthusiasts and anyone who appreciates cute and playful accessories.

### **Customer Feedback:**

- "I love this so much!!! It's super cute, great size, and material. I love it!!!"
- "This is the brand that I have and it doesn't leak like the others. It is well insulated, and it stays cold for a long time."
- "Just as advertised!!! Wish there were more graduating sizes larger with the pigs!!"
- "Great small ice bag. Not as good as one I had before that I bought in a store. This one leaks sometimes."

### **Indulge in Luxury, Convenience, and Fun**

Enhance your bath and spa experience with the Bath Accessories Ice Bag, Pigs. With its charming design, exceptional insulation, and leak-proof functionality, this ice bag will elevate your self-care routine to new heights. Don't miss out on the chance to pamper yourself at home. Grab the Bath Accessories Ice Bag now!

## Crewmate Temporary Tattoos | Imposter - Red is Sus - Emergency Meeting - Trust No One - Sabotage - Shhhh! & more

Long-lasting and waterproof, this set of 28 skin-safe temporary tattoos is the perfect party supply for fans of the popular spaceship sleuth video game. With an average rating of 4.6 and over 300 satisfied customers, these tattoos are a hit among players of all ages.

### Party Ready and Convenient

Each pack includes 28 tattoos, featuring popular designs such as Imposter, Red is Sus, Crewmate, Trust No One, Sabotage, Report, Kill Report, Shhhh!, Kill, Ghost, and more. Our large 2” x 2” tattoos are individually printed, so no cutting is required. They are perfect to share with friends, drop into goodie bags as party favors, or use as prizes.

### Long-lasting and Skin-safe

Our premium quality tattoos are long-lasting and waterproof, making them ideal for all kinds of parties, including pool and beach events. They can even be used to decorate cups, balloons, and beach-balls! Made in the USA with skin-safe ingredients, our tattoos are easy to apply and remove. They can last 5-7 days, even with bathing.

### Satisfaction Guaranteed

As a leading supplier of premium temporary tattoos in the USA for over 20 years, we have sold over 50 million tattoos. We thank you for buying American and supporting US jobs! We are confident in the quality of our tattoos and offer a satisfaction guarantee.

Order your pack of Crewmate Temporary Tattoos today and add a touch of fun to your next party or event!

Price: $6.95
Store: Fashiontats

Product ID: B08SSXQSVX Title: Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream - Peppermint scent - 2oz Average Rating: 4.3 Number of Ratings: 46 Features: ['Made with 99.999% pure silver and infused with peppermint, helps to soothe and hydrate dry, tired, and overworked feet', 'Infused with essential oils like peppermint, sweet almond, and cocoa butter for an invigorating and nourishing experience, cocoa and shea butters help to deeply moisturize and protect the skin', 'Peppermint oil provides a cool and soothing sensation, while sweet almond oil is rich in antioxidants and vitamins', 'Absorbs quickly, leaving feet feeling refreshed and revitalized, non-greasy formula that is suitable for daily use', 'Free from harsh chemicals and artificial fragrances, made in the USA with high-quality ingredients.'] Description: ['Colloidal Silver Foot Cream with Peppermint is a luxurious and moisturizing cream designed to hydrate and soothe the feet. Infused with colloidal silver and the refreshing scent of peppermint oil, this non-greasy formula quickly absorbs into the skin, leaving feet feeling soft and refreshed. The nourishing ingredients help to moisturize and protect the skin, while the peppermint aroma invigorates and soothes the senses. This foot cream is suitable for daily use and free of harsh chemicals or additives, making it a gentle and effective way to pamper your feet.'] Price: 14.99 Store: Silver Miracles Details: {"Brand": "Silver Miracles", "Scent": "Peppermint", "Item Form": "Cream", "Active Ingredients": "Argentum Metallicum", "Unit Count": "2.0 Ounce", "Package Dimensions": "2.3 x 2.3 x 2.2 inches; 3.21 Ounces", "UPC": "725022933210", "Manufacturer": "L&N Enterprises, LLC"} Review Text: According to the product label, the purpose of the Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream is to hydrate, lubricate, moisturize, and soothe dry skin, AND kill odor-causing bacteria. From what I can tell, it seems to do this, but not in a dramatic fashion. The ingredients include Almond Oil, Cocoa Seed Butter, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Urea, Peppermint Oil, Menthol, and Colloidal Silver. As others have pointed out, the cream spreads easy enough but doesn't seem to absorb that well into the skin. Also, the dinky-sized jar only contains 2-ounces. So, you'll probably go through the bottle fairly quickly if you follow the instructions and apply liberally. It's a decent foot cream overall but seems a little pricey for the small amount you get. I use anti-fungal cream on my feet to keep the skin moist and lubricated, and cure or prevent fungal infections including athlete foot. Silver is naturally anti-bacterial and anti-fungal, so I got this small jar (2 oz). It has a faint minty fragrance.

You could use something like this anywhere on the body, of course, but it is quite greasy. A little goes a long way. After a shower, I apply it to my entire foot and ankle, paying attention to get it between the toes and around the nails, and then I put on clean socks.

It’s working for me. This is great on the winter heels, I apply it at night and use my moisturizing sock and over the course of a week have found my feet become softer with less flaky dead skin, it's very moisturizing and hydrating applying after a foot bath or a shower. My heels are really dry - what I could describe as 'hoof-y' - so I use creams/treatments to keep the skin from feeling uncomfortably tight and super rough. This foot cream is effective on making my heels feel more comfortable plus I'm using this cream on my entire feet. This cream has a peppermint scent which I find invigorating so it's good I use this in the morning before putting on my socks. I don't have any problem with foot odor so I cannot evaluate that. This is a thick cream that absorbs quite quickly on my poor dry feet. I apply, wait a minute or so, and then pull on my socks as I want the cream to soak into my feet and not my socks. My rating is 5 stars for I'm entirely happy with this foot cream, how it absorbs, and its effectiveness. [[VIDEOID:29f672525b29e6a29c81244cde21aa93]] Well packed Greasy stuff, not my cup of tea, but my wife she is OK with, so no waste here for this free for a review cream. Otherwise my wife says : IT WORKS! Returned item unopened . Ounces were small fir price . The Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream isn’t just for feet. The antibacterial priorities make it excellent for killing foot odor which is why it’s marketed for feet. But… also here on Amazon, you can purchase silver infused socks that last much longer than a jar of ointment to cure foot issues.

The silver properties are excellent for first aid as well and in my opinion make better use of the ointment (based on cost effectiveness for purpose). It’s good for minor skin irritations, cuts, abrasions and especially burns.

It came in handy initially as I managed to burn myself promptly after receiving it. It helped the burn heal much faster, while keeping infection at bay, than if I had just let nature take its course.

I learned about the healing properties of colloidal silver about 20 years ago when my daughter burned herself as a little girl. The ER doctor sent us home with colloidal silver cream and it fixed her right up.

I like to keep it on hand now for just such emergencies. Highly recommended. I'm very happy about its moisturizing effect. It's absorbed quickly so it doesn't make sheets or socks greasy. Nice subtle scent. Is very rich but easily absorbs into the skin without feeling too greasy. I use it just before bed and my feet feel soft and smooth the next morning.

Hope you found this review helpful! This jar of Colloidal Silver Foot Cream by Silver Miracles arrived with a double safety seal. A clear plastic seal outside and internally, under the lid, another seal.

It is white and the cream is easy to use and once applied is easy to massage into the skin.

I’m not exactly sure why this is Foot Cream, as it has many uses on the body.

My first exposure to this type of product occurred when I needed a remedy for poison ivy. While it is not intended for that, it can help with reducing the spread of poison ivy and did seem to help mine heal faster. I did rely mostly on drying lotions like Calamine, to stop the oozing.

You are instructed to first wash the affected area, then dry it, before applying this cream. So, it’s not really like a lot of other creams which you simply apply. I suppose you will still benefit from it if it is not washed, but the label was referencing feet, which can get really dirty. Wash hands after use.

This is a great cream for small cuts, rashes, insect bites and burns.

Recommended The foot cream is very moisturizing, rich and creamy.

I read the ingredients before I ordered and was maybe expecting a nice almond scent, since almond oil was one of the first ingredients but no it smells a bit more like minty something.

I do think the cream works very nice but the container is small and won’t last a real long time.

I ordered to use especially in the summer time when I am wearing sandals all the time and my feet get so dry .

## Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream - Peppermint Scent - 2oz

Looking to pamper and revitalize your tired feet? Look no further than the Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream with Peppermint! This luxurious cream is designed to hydrate and soothe dry, overworked feet, leaving them feeling soft and refreshed. With an average rating of 4.3 and 46 customer reviews, this foot cream is a customer favorite.

### Features

- Made with 99.999% pure silver and infused with peppermint, this foot cream helps to soothe and hydrate dry, tired feet.
- Infused with essential oils like peppermint, sweet almond, and cocoa butter for an invigorating and nourishing experience.
- Absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving feet feeling refreshed and revitalized.
- Non-greasy formula that is suitable for daily use.
- Free from harsh chemicals and artificial fragrances, made in the USA with high-quality ingredients.

### Benefits

The Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream goes beyond simple moisturization. With its unique blend of ingredients, it offers a range of benefits for your feet:

- Hydrates and soothes dry, tired feet, providing lasting relief.
- Nourishes and protects the skin, thanks to ingredients like sweet almond oil and cocoa butter.
- The peppermint oil provides a cool and soothing sensation, perfect for refreshing your feet after a long day.
- With its non-greasy formula, this foot cream absorbs quickly, allowing you to go about your day without any greasy residue.
- Suitable for daily use, this foot cream is a gentle and effective way to pamper your feet.

### Experience the Silver Miracles Difference

Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream is made with care by Silver Miracles, a trusted brand in the industry. Each jar contains 2 ounces of product and is priced at $14.99. This foot cream is backed by positive customer reviews, highlighting its effectiveness and moisturizing properties.

So why wait? Treat your feet to the Silver Miracles Colloidal Silver Foot Cream with Peppermint today and experience the difference for yourself!

# boqq Organic Gray Reverse Shampoo Bar

Revive Your Hair's Youthful Glow with the boqq Organic Gray Reverse Shampoo Bar. This unique shampoo bar is designed to gently cleanse and darken white and gray hair, giving you a vibrant and youthful look. Crafted with 100% organic and natural plant ingredients, this shampoo bar is free from harsh chemical detergents and pH balanced for safe use on treated hair.

## Features and Benefits:

### Reverse White and Gray Hair

Using this naturally darkening shampoo bar is as easy as using any ordinary shampoo. Just apply one dose of this shampoo bar, and watch as white and gray hair instantly transforms into a more youthful and vivid shade.

### Promote Hair Growth

The special formula of the boqq Shampoo Bar not only stimulates hair follicles and promotes blood circulation on the scalp but also helps in the production of melanin, effectively improving gray hair and making your hair beautiful.

### Washing and Conditioning

This shampoo bar deeply nourishes the hair and scalp, repairing damaged hair and controlling oil. Experience hair that is firm, moisturized, hydrated, and as light as petals! It's the perfect choice for men and women looking to prevent hair loss.

### Gentle and Natural Formula

Formulated with a gentle and natural formula, the boqq Shampoo Bar is suitable for everyone, including men, women, teenagers, children, babies, pregnant women, and breastfeeding women. Now, the whole family can enjoy the benefits of this amazing shampoo.

## Customer Reviews:

- "Easy to use and cleans your hair. It turns the hair color reddish brown and coarse. Does not cover the gray hair. Easy to travel with it." - *Verified Customer*

- "This is my second time buying because it helps with hair growth and does seem to assist with maintaining my dark hair color. The scent is clean and woodsy, and it is very easy to travel with. I think the value of the shampoo is worth it." - *Verified Customer*

- "As a result of being sick, I experienced hair loss, and every time I washed it, a handful would fall out. I was willing to try (almost) anything to get hair to grow. Tried this product and I started getting new growth. My hairdresser noticed the difference in thickness and how healthy my hair looked. I bought shampoo again to share with sister and daughter-in-law due to their hair thinning. And yes, I'm a real, live customer and not a paid person or robot." - *Verified Customer*

Experience the transformative effects of the boqq Organic Gray Reverse Shampoo Bar. Embrace your true hair color with confidence, and enjoy vibrant, healthy-looking hair. Click **Add to Cart** now and get yours today!

# BioMiracle StarDust Pixie Bubble Mask

## For Clear, Even Skin

Discover the secret to a clear, even complexion with the BioMiracle StarDust Pixie Bubble Mask. This innovative foaming face mask is infused with powerful ingredients like Green Tea and Apple, delivering a deep cleanse that minimizes fine lines and wrinkles for a glowing, youthful skin.

### Gentle and Nourishing

This bubble face mask is gentle on the skin, making it suitable for even the most sensitive skin types. With soothing ingredients like Green Tea and Apple, it cleanses and clarifies without causing any irritation. You can trust BioMiracle to provide a safe and effective skincare solution.

### Improved Skin Texture

It's time to wave goodbye to uneven skin texture. The clarifying foaming mask penetrates deep into your pores, reducing dark spots and helping to improve the overall appearance of your skin. Experience a more radiant complexion with every use.

### Long-Lasting Hydration

Say hello to hydrated and revitalized skin. BioMiracle's innovative Cupro sheet masks deliver long-lasting hydration, locking in moisture to keep your skin feeling refreshed and nourished. Treat your tired, thirsty pores to the hydration they deserve.

### Safe and Cruelty-Free

BioMiracle cares about the well-being of your skin and the environment. That's why this bubble face mask contains NO parabens and has undergone NO animal testing. Feel good about using a skincare product that prioritizes your skin's health and our planet's well-being.

Don't miss out on the benefits of the BioMiracle StarDust Pixie Bubble Mask. Treat yourself to a clarifying foaming face mask that delivers results. Order now and experience a more radiant, even complexion!

## DUDUWIG 20inch Long Half Black Half Pink Curly Fashion Wigs for Kid Girls (Black/Pink)

**Price: $19.99**
**Store: DUDUWIG**

Chose DUDUWIG Brand Wigs, Show Your New Style. Perfect for Cosplay, Costume Parties, and More!

### Design and Material: 

- Specially designed for kids, with a recommended head circumference of less than 21 inches (please measure before purchasing).
- Made of high-quality heat-resistant synthetic fiber that looks natural, real, pretty, and fun.
- Vibrant Black/Pink color adds a touch of style and uniqueness.
- The wig measure approximately 20 inches in length and weighs around 200g.
- Package includes 1 wig and 1 wig cap for easy and comfortable wear.

### Care and Maintenance: 

- The wig doesn't require frequent washing but should be cared for regularly.
- Smooth the wig before gently washing it in cold or lukewarm water with mild shampoo.
- Rinse thoroughly and towel to remove excess water.
- Use a metal comb or oxhorn comb to detangle the wig, then allow it to hang and dry naturally.
- Synthetic wigs may experience minimum shedding and tangling, which is normal.
- After the wig is dry, brush it into your desired style and enjoy wearing it again.

### Storage Tips: 

- It's recommended to store the wig on a wig stand or mannequin to maintain its shape.
- Alternatively, you can store it in a hair net and place it in a plastic bag or a paper box.
- Remember to store the wig in a cool, dry area for optimal preservation.

### Customer Reviews:

- "Color is pretty and the color split looks good."
- "My daughter thought the colors were cute and fun to wear."
- "My daughter really dislikes the bangs, I'm going to have to cut them."
- "My daughter does find the wig to be a little itchy."
- "I wish the wig had combs built-in up front to help it stay put better."
- "I had quite a bit of hair loss from the wig while using."
- "My daughter found the wig super uncomfortable to wear because of the bangs."
- "I found it extremely hard to keep the pink and purple separate."

Choose DUDUWIG and enjoy wigs better! Order your DUDUWIG 20inch Long Half Black Half Pink Curly Fashion Wig for Kid Girls today!

Product ID: B091MVZW95
Title: CHROM tooth polish uptight white, instant whitening paint for teeth (LAVISH LAVANDER)
Average Rating: 2.4
Number of Ratings: 13
Features: ['CHROM IS A TOOTH POLISH, JUST LIKE NAIL POLISH, THAT CAN BE APPLIED TO TEETH AND REMOVED IN A MATTER OF SECONDS, AND LASTS FOR UP TO 24 HOURS AT A TIME.', 'TO APPLY Mix pigment. Dry teeth. Paint Toothpolish.', 'THIS IS the more easy way to get a perfect white smile in seconds (You really gonna get a CELEBRITY PHOTO SMILE).', 'FD&C approved ingredients. Vegan and cruelty-free. 100% American made. Safe for most teeth.', 'Developed by dentists.']
Description: ['CHROM is a tooth polish, just like nail polish, that can be applied to teeth and removed in a matter of seconds, and lasts for up to 24 hours at a time. It has no taste', 'TO APPLY', '1. Mix it up. Shake the bottle hard to mix the settled pigments. If pigments are still settled after shaking, stir with a toothpick. Using the integrated brush to mix or agitate will cause unwanted fraying of the bristles.', '2. Dry teeth. Tuck cotton rolls between gums to keep mouth open. Wipe saliva off with cloth, tissue, or gauze. Teeth must be completely dry for Toothpolish to stick.', '3. Paint Toothpolish. Apply in thin layers. To avoid streaking, paint 1-3 strokes per tooth. It is important to allow at least 10 seconds dry time between layers. Polish is dry when hardened. Not dry = soft/jelly. Keep product clean. After polishing each tooth, wipe brush off on a disposable cloth or gauze before dipping it back into the bottle. Wiping brush, brush arm, and bottle edge with high-proof alcohol is also recommended. Do not leave brushes out too long since they will dry & harden.', '4. Fix it. Use a toothpick to remove excess polish from gums and gaps. Polish is easier to manipulate when wet. As with any technique, practice practice practice! Enjoy any drink while smiling wild. Toothpolish will last while eating soft foods only. Take Toothpolish with you to reapply after some meals, just like you do with lipstick.', 'TO REMOVE', 'Chip it off. Use your clean fingernail to chip off the polish. Or cover your finger with a cloth, tissue, or gauze. It is easiest to remove Toothpolish when polish is completely dry. To remove excess flakes, brush & floss teeth.', 'FAQ:', 'Toothpolish is intended for use as a cosmetic tooth coating. It is not permanent & does not alter the tooth in any way, only the color. It will not harm teeth or permanent dental work.']
Price: 27.99
Store: Genérico

# CHROM Tooth Polish Uptight White - Instant Whitening Paint for Teeth (LAVISH LAVANDER)

Achieve a picture-perfect white smile in seconds with CHROM Tooth Polish Uptight White. This innovative tooth polish, inspired by nail polish technology, allows you to easily apply and remove a beautiful white coating to your teeth in a matter of seconds. Lasting for up to 24 hours, this tooth polish will leave you feeling confident and ready to take on the day.

## Easy Application Process

With CHROM Tooth Polish Uptight White, achieving a dazzling smile has never been easier. Simply follow these steps for flawless application:

1. **Mix it up**: Shake the bottle vigorously to ensure the pigments are fully mixed. If any pigments settle after shaking, use a toothpick to stir them gently.

2. **Dry teeth**: Use cotton rolls to keep your mouth open and wipe away any saliva. Dry teeth are essential for the tooth polish to adhere properly.

3. **Paint Toothpolish**: Apply the tooth polish in thin layers, using 1-3 strokes per tooth to prevent streaking. Allow each layer to dry for at least 10 seconds before applying the next. You'll know the polish is dry when it hardens.

4. **Fix it**: Use a toothpick to remove any excess polish from your gums and gaps. Practice makes perfect, so don't worry if it takes a few tries to get it just right.

## Safe and Convenient

Developed by dentists and made with FD&C approved ingredients, CHROM Tooth Polish Uptight White is a safe and effective way to enhance your smile. This vegan and cruelty-free product is 100% American made and gentle on most teeth. It works wonders for special occasions, photoshoots, or just when you want to feel your best.

## Remove with Ease

When it's time to remove the polish, simply chip it off using a clean fingernail or cover your finger with a cloth. For best results, remove the polish when it's completely dry. Brushing and flossing afterward will help remove any excess flakes.

## Frequently Asked Questions

- **Is Toothpolish safe for my teeth and dental work?** Absolutely! Toothpolish is designed to be a cosmetic tooth coating that does not alter your teeth in any way—only the color. It will not harm your teeth or any permanent dental work.

Whether you're preparing for a special occasion or just want to add some extra sparkle to your smile, CHROM Tooth Polish Uptight White is the perfect solution. Don't miss out on the opportunity to flash a confident, radiant smile. Order your bottle now and experience the magic of CHROM Tooth Polish Uptight White!

**Price**: $27.99
**Store**: Genérico

The TIERRYMOON Gua Sha is expertly designed to enhance your tone, firmness, and lift. It effectively prevents wrinkles and depuffs, giving you a revitalized and youthful appearance.

## Easy to Use
Incorporating this gua sha into your skincare routine is effortless. Simply use it in the morning and night with your favorite face oil, moisturizer, or serum. Gently massage your face and neck in an upward and outward motion to promote better circulation and a healthy glow.

Experience the deep massage benefits of the TIERRYMOON Gua Sha beyond just your face. Its cooling and calming properties make it perfect for body massage as well. By using this tool, you can help move lymphatic fluids and radiate positive energy throughout your body.

# Silk Hair Scrunchie Set: Add Style and Versatility to Your Hair

✨ Elevate your hair game with our Silk Hair Scarf Scrunchie Hair Ties in solid colors. This set includes three premium-quality scrunchies that are perfect for any occasion. Here's why our scrunchies are a must-have for every woman:

## 1. Good for Your Hair

Our scarf scrunchies are made from a soft and gentle fabric that minimizes hair breakage. Unlike regular hair ties, these scrunchies are less likely to get tangled or caught in your hair, ensuring healthier and happier locks.

## 2. Transform Bad Hair Days into Great Ones

Can't decide what to do with your hair? Our scrunchies come to the rescue! Whether you want a cute and playful vibe with a vibrant high ponytail, a professional and sophisticated look with a low ponytail, or a boho-inspired style with a messy top bun, these scrunchies can accommodate all your hair crises.

Looking to make a fashion statement? Our scrunchies are just what you need! When wearing an outfit with multiple colors, these beautiful scrunchies can complement your look and make a specific color pop out, adding a touch of elegance and style to your overall ensemble.

## 4. Versatile Accessories

Not only do our scrunchies do wonders for your hair, but they also make fabulous accessories. Wear them on your wrist for a pop of color and a stylish touch that perfectly complements your outfit.

## 5. Never Lose Them Again

Say goodbye to misplaced hair ties! The bright colors and larger size of our scrunchies make them easier to find and harder to lose. You can even collect and store all your scrunchies on a cheap binder ring for ultimate convenience.

✨ With their adorable floral design and trendy appeal, our Silk Hair Scarf Scrunchie Hair Ties are a must-have for every fashion-forward woman. # 100% PURE Coconut Body Scrub Exfoliating Deep Cleanse with Sea Salts & Nourishing Oils - Natural Deeply Moisturizing Skincare - Vibrant Radiant Skin Restore & Pore Cleanser - Vegan - 10oz

Crystalline sea salt scrub smoothes while softening skin with rich, supple moisture. Suspended in a base of silky sunflower and apricot oils, this emollient sea salt scrub buffs away bumps and flakes to reveal glowing, rejuvenated skin.

## Buff out the Rough Spots

Say goodbye to flakes, bumps, and dry patches! Our Coconut Body Scrub is a skin-quenching bath and shower rub that gives you a deep cleanse from head to toe. With just one use, you'll reveal a radiant, deeply nourished body. From your hands to your feet and even your bum, this scrub will leave your skin feeling smooth, soft, and refreshed.

## Restore That Youthful Glow

Detoxifying crystals gently exfoliate your skin, while fatty acids, vitamin E, and jojoba work together to protect your skin from free radical damage and soothe dryness and chafing. The result? Smooth, comfortable, and super soft skin that glows with a youthful radiance. 

## Mind-Bending Detoxification

Treat yourself to a tropical island getaway with our Coconut Body Scrub. Let the sea salt and coconut transport your skin and senses to a place of full-body rejuvenation. Experience softer, healthier-looking skin that will make you feel refreshed and revitalized every time you use it.

## Give Your Skin Some Love

Stimulate and remove the buildup of dead skin cells with our non-greasy moisturizing plant-based and antioxidant blend. Prepare your skin to better absorb moisture from your favorite creams and lotions. Our Coconut Body Scrub is designed to provide you with convenience and a truly nourishing skincare experience.

## Beauty Doesn't Get Any Cleaner

When you choose our Coconut Body Scrub, you don't have to sacrifice health for beauty. We believe in using well-researched, healthy, natural, and organic ingredients that meet strict purity standards. Our cruelty-free products are made from ethically sourced ingredients without harsh toxic chemicals, heavy metals, or dyes. Plus, it's gluten-free, vegan, and proudly Made in the USA.

---

*Price: $38.0*  
*Average Rating: 3.8*  
*Number of Ratings: 25*  
*Store: 100% PURE*

# Ulta Beauty Box Glam Edition: A Makeup Palette That's Perfect for Gifts

Are you searching for the ultimate makeup set that offers endless possibilities for glam looks? Look no further than the Ulta Beauty Box Glam Edition. This stunning makeup palette, housed in an elegant Purple Hearts case, is designed to make you feel like a beauty expert.

With a whopping 94 pieces, this Ulta Beauty Box is a treasure trove of colors and finishes. From sheer to matte, this palette caters to every skin type, ensuring that everyone can indulge in the joy of creating stunning makeup looks.

## The Perfect Gift for Any Makeup Lover

Looking for a gift that will impress any makeup enthusiast? The Ulta Beauty Box Glam Edition has you covered. Its beautiful presentation and extensive range of colors make it the ideal gift for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion.

## Create Any Look Your Heart Desires

Whether you're in the mood for a natural daytime look or an intense, smoky eye for a night out, this palette has everything you need. Experiment with various shades and textures to create your own unique style.

## Convenience at Its Best

We understand how important it is to have all your makeup essentials in one place. That's why this beauty box comes with extra room in the bottom for small bottles and makeup brushes. Say goodbye to messy makeup drawers and hello to effortless organization.

## Discover the Ulta Beauty Difference

Why settle for anything less than the best? Ulta Beauty is renowned for their high-quality products and dedication to customer satisfaction. Rest assured, you're investing in a brand that delivers on its promises.

## Customer Review:

Experience the captivating scent of the Bath & Body Works Canyon Men's Collection with this 2-piece bundle. Included in this set is a 3.4 fl oz cologne and a convenient 0.5 fl oz mini cologne, perfect for on-the-go freshness. 

### Features

- Brand: Bath & Body Works
- Item Volume: 0.5 Fluid Ounces (mini cologne)
- Age Range: Adult
- Style: Modern
- Unit Count: 3.4 Fl Oz (cologne)

### Powerful Scent, Unmatched Sophistication

With its alluring fragrance, the Canyon Men's Collection by Bath & Body Works creates a lasting impression. Delicately blended notes of fresh herbs, smoky vanilla, and rich amber combine to give you a scent that is both rugged and refined. 

### Benefits

1. Long-lasting confidence: The potent fragrance of this cologne lingers all day, leaving you feeling confident and invigorated.

2. Versatile size options: The 3.4 fl oz bottle is perfect for everyday use, while the mini cologne, measuring just 0.5 fl oz, is ideal for travel or a quick touch-up between events. 

3. Convenient packaging: Both colognes come in sleek, easy-to-carry bottles that fit effortlessly into your pocket or bag. 

### Trusted Customer Reviews

> "Love this, it was exactly what I was looking for. It’s what my long distance partner wears, and I tend to miss them a lot, so this definitely helps in handling the distance. Item was exactly as described. Came in faster than expected and was packaged neatly! Thankful I found this item!" - *5-star review*

> "A nice note and lollipop from this seller was included.☺️👍👍 Very misleading." - *3-star review*

### Trustworthy and Efficient Service

At Bath & Body Works, we take pride in providing exceptional products and customer service. Discover the compelling scent of the Canyon Men's Collection - order your 2-piece bundle today and experience the fragrance that sets you apart.

## Native Deodorant Mint Cookie Cupcake - Freshness and Indulgence Combined

The Native Deodorant Mint Cookie Cupcake is a unique and irresistible offering from the collaboration between Native and Baked by Melissa. With its cool mint mixed with chocolate cookie scent, this deodorant provides a vibrant and sweet aroma that is truly a treat for the senses.

### Features:
- Native x Baked by Melissa - Mint Cookie Cupcake Deodorant
- Scent: Cool mint mixed with chocolate cookie
- Net weight: 2.65 oz (75g)

### Benefits:
1. Long-lasting freshness: This deodorant helps keep you feeling fresh all day long. The carefully crafted scent combination ensures that you stay pleasantly fragrant, even during strenuous activities.
2. Aluminum and paraben-free: Enjoy the peace of mind of using a deodorant that is free from harmful ingredients like aluminum and parabens. This deodorant is made with natural ingredients that are gentle on the skin.
3. Easy to use: The lightweight design of the deodorant stick makes it convenient to carry and apply anytime, anywhere. Its compact size fits perfectly in your bag or pocket, allowing you to stay fresh on-the-go.

Created with the customer in mind, Native Deodorant Mint Cookie Cupcake is the perfect balance of freshness and indulgence. It's time to elevate your daily deodorant ritual with the delightful fragrance and long-lasting protection of this unique product.

[Get your Native Deodorant Mint Cookie Cupcake today](#) and experience the joy of indulgence while staying confidently fresh throughout the day.
